Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: It’s a dangerous place. Let’s get you out of here.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Who are you?! There so many bandits out there! And more trucks keep arriving!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: We’ve got to move on. Are you with us?

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04b
Reply.text: Yes! They’ll kill me if I stay…

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04a
Reply.text: I’m not leaving this place until we kill them all. They are murderers!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N05a
Reply.text: We stand no chance against them. Follow us if you want to live.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N06a
Reply.text: Hrrr. I’ll be back!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N01
Reply.text: You were this close to getting killed. My people arrived just on time.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N02
Reply.text: Who are you and why did you help me?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N03
Reply.text: We help all people in need.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N04
Reply.text: You haven’t answered my question!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N05
Reply.text: The bravest and the smartest people from all over the world come here lured by the Call. But most of them find their end here… And they wouldn’t listen to me when I tell them that.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N06
Reply.text: I’ve got to find Ivan Go. I’ve gone such a long way – I’m not going to stop now.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N07
Reply.text: I remember everyone I meet. I know the man you are talking about. He’s gone too far.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N08
Reply.text: Is Ivan dead?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N09
Reply.text: The thing that happened to him is worse than death. But it’s just as irreversible.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N10
Reply.text: Stop talking mysteries. Tell me, where he is.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N11
Reply.text: You won’t understand until you see him, but then it’ll be too late. Go after him, if you have to. We’ll talk again after you come back.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N01
Reply.text: Your willpower is impressive! You could resist the voice of heaven.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N02
Reply.text: I don’t know what you are talking about.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N03
Reply.text: Few find enough strength to return from the Source. For years we’ve been waiting for you to come.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N04
Reply.text: Let’s get to the point.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N05
Reply.text: You are destined to stop the madness that seized all those people.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N06
Reply.text: I’ll do what I can. But tell me first, what happened here?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N07
Reply.text: Years ago our world was different. There were huge countries, cities with millions of dwellers, clever machines that did your work for you! Everything was simple. But suddenly the world collapsed.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N08
Reply.text: Clever machines? I wouldn’t trust them… What happened?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N09
Reply.text: Military forces spotted an unidentified flying object, which was immediately brought down. You saw it on your way. I was part of the group that was sent to examine the mysterious object. The country was on the verge of war. We were the only scientists left studying this UFO. Little wonder we were in hurry and a bit careless.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N10
Reply.text: It all makes little sense to me, but go on…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N11
Reply.text: When we got on board the ship – it was a ship, no doubt – we were ecstatic. We thought of the endless opportunities: new medicine, ultrastrong materials, revolutionary technologies… But we found death instead: several scientists got crushed by the machines, 3 of my colleagues committed suicide. But the worst thing happened when we opened a sealed cell in the central tank…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N12
Reply.text: You shouldn’t have done it… How could you ignore all those warning signs?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N13
Reply.text: But we are scientists! We don’t believe in superstition. Anyway, the moment we opened that door, all hell broke loose. My colleagues… their bodies exploded… and I heard this strange voice inside my head… I blacked out and when I woke up, I was outside the ship, in the camp. I called for help, but nobody came. The radio was silent. I realized that there was a catastrophe.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N14
Reply.text: So, you’ve destroyed the world to satisfy your curiosity!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N15
Reply.text: Yes. And it’s killing me. I’ve got to be punished, but I don’t feel pain. God knows how many times I tried to kill myself, but all in vain – I can’t die! It was terrible. I thought I was the only survivor, but more people started to arrive. I was horrified when I saw how much they mutated… Just look at me or at yourself! I dread to think what’s under your mask...

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N16
Reply.text: What are you talking about? We are wearing masks because the air is contaminated!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N17
Reply.text: Whatever. Let it be the air. What matters now is that the device is still working and it keeps contaminating the atmosphere.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N18
Reply.text: If we turn it off, are people going to be normal again? Why didn’t you go back and stop the device?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N19
Reply.text: I can neither come close to the device, nor leave this place. I am doomed to stay here and watch. All I can do is ask people to destroy the damn thing. Not that anyone succeeded...

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20b
Reply.text: You’ve done the humanity so much harm. I’m gonna blow up this place along with you!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21b
Reply.text: It’s more than I could ask. We’ve taken samples to the north-western military complex. They’ve probably got the results now and will tell you how to destroy the Source. Even if the people are dead, the AI of the complex should be still functioning.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22b
Reply.text: I’ve been there and I know this AI of yours pretty well. It calls itself the Oracle.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23b
Reply.text: Good luck to you. I hope you will succeed where other people failed.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24b
Reply.text: Good bye. I don’t think I’ll see you again.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20a
Reply.text: I’ve got to save all those people. There must be a way to turn the machine off without getting too close.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21a
Reply.text: Ivan Go talked about strange lights in the sky. And he wasn’t all that surprised when he saw the space ship. He’s probably seen it already.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22a
Reply.text: His friend Ben Throttle might know something about it. I must talk to him.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23a
Reply.text: Off you go and may luck be with you.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24a
Reply.text: I’ll need it.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N01
Reply.text: There’s nothing I can do for you. Go and do what you have to do.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N02
Reply.text: It won’t be easy, but I’ll make it.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N01
Reply.text: You resisted the Great Call, stranger. Let me give you this.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N02
Reply.text: What call are you talking about?!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N03
Reply.text: Hush, they are watching us. This is the last copy of the book that tells you what happened to our world.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N04
Reply.text: Hey, where are you going? He left in a hurry...

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N01
Reply.text: Today is the race day! Anyone can take part in it!

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02b
Reply.text: Not interested.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02a
Reply.text: Count me in.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N03a
Reply.text: You’ve got to pay the participant’s fee of 5,000 coins + 5,000 the insurance cost.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000158
Reply.text: I have insurance, so I’m not giving you that car.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000164
Reply.text: Fair enough.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N04aa
Reply.text: What car? What are you talking about?

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N05aa
Reply.text: The bolide is an expensive car. You’ll have to compensate its cost if you break it.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aac
Reply.text: I don’t have so much money!

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aab
Reply.text: Nah, I’m out of here.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aaa
Reply.text: It’s a deal. What are the rules?

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N07aaa
Reply.text: The rules are simple: you lose if you make a false start or if you crush the car. 1st prize is 40,000, 2nd – 20,000, 3rd – 10,000. The repair works will be extracted from the insurance cost, so you might not get all of your 5,000 back.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N08aaa
Reply.text: I see. Come on!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000153
Reply.text: You can try your luck and your driving skill and win the main prize!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000154
Reply.text: What do I need to do?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000155
Reply.text: Go through the maze full of traps. It’s dangerous, but the adrenaline is worth it!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000160
Reply.text: It’s not my idea of fun.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000159
Reply.text: I’d like to have a go at it!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000161
Reply.text: Good. The participant’s fee is 1,000. If you get to the end, the prize is yours. If not, then, sorry man!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000167
Reply.text: I don’t have money.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000162
Reply.text: Deal.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000168
Reply.text: Have you come here to get insurance?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000169
Reply.text: What sort of insurance do you give?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000170
Reply.text: We can insure your car against damage in the race. If you crush it, we’ll compensate the repair costs.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000173
Reply.text: I don’t need it.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000171
Reply.text: How much does the insurance cost?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000172
Reply.text: It costs 1,000. If the car gets damaged, we’ll return you half the sum, but if you crush it, we’re keeping the whole sum.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000174
Reply.text: Is that all?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000175
Reply.text: There’s one more thing. In case of your victory, we’ll get 25% of the prize.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000178
Reply.text: I don’t have money.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000177
Reply.text: I’m not buying it.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000176
Reply.text: Your conditions don’t sound too bad. I’d like to insure my bolide.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000187
Reply.text: Welcome to the world of grownup men entertainment!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000188
Reply.text: What’s so special about your entertainment?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000189
Reply.text: We help to unleash your true nature and feel utter pleasure!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000190
Reply.text: How’s that?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000191
Reply.text: You’ll get a chance to kill your match, not just a bunch of stupid bandits.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000194
Reply.text: I don’t want to risk my butt.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000192
Reply.text: Sounds interesting. I’d like to try.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000193
Reply.text: Good. So, here are the rules...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000000
Reply.text: Look! It’s them!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000001
Reply.text: Who?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000002
Reply.text: The people who massacred your village.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000003
Reply.text: Are you sure? I can get my revenge right here!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000004
Reply.text: Absolutely. That’s the truck I saw in the village.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000006
Reply.text: It’s time for revenge then. Blood for blood.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000005
Reply.text: I think they are just mercenaries. Let’s follow them and find the true murderers.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000007
Reply.text: Why do you want to kill us, stranger?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000008
Reply.text: You’ve attacked my village and killed all of our people several months ago.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000009
Reply.text: What are you talking about, man? We wouldn’t go further than it takes to defend our towns.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N01
Reply.text: It’s been ages since we saw a new face in our lands. Make yourself at home, stranger!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P02
Reply.text: I’m looking for a man...

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N03
Reply.text: Stop looking. You’ve come to the best place in the world. The gardens and the fountains of our town have been glorified by the greatest poets! What more could a man want?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P04
Reply.text: I see neither gardens, nor fountains here.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N05
Reply.text: Every day the evil demons of the desert raid our houses and destroy everything on their way. We have to be always on guard – that’s why our monuments are neglected. Without due care they crumble... What a shame!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P06
Reply.text: But can anyone help me find the man I need. He passed these places several years ago.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N07
Reply.text: We don’t keep track of the travelers; we’ve got other things to worry about. Our elders might be of help, though. But they’ve left the town.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P08
Reply.text: Where have they gone?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N09
Reply.text: Of this I do not know. Ask our neighbors, they might tell you. Try Kef, for instance.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P10
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll try my luck in the Kef.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Good night, traveler. What brought you so far?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N02
Reply.text: Greetings. A man called Ivan passed these places several years ago. He hasn’t come back, and I need to find him. Is there anybody who might help me here?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: I’m afraid not. Our elders, the memory keepers, have left us. We don’t know where they’ve gone and we can’t find them. We are trying though!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N04
Reply.text: Why did they leave?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Because of the war, I guess. The incessant attacks made us weak and neglectful to our elders. We forgot that there is beauty in the world. All we are thinking about is survival. But you’ve made me think, is the kind of life we have worth living?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N06
Reply.text: Strange things you are saying.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: One of our rescue parties is going to come back soon. Wait a while; they may have news of the elders. In the meantime, could you help us out?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N08
Reply.text: What is it?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Oil is our blood. Without it, our trucks will stop and we’ll be totally helpless before the attackers.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N10
Reply.text: You sure will be. But what happened to your oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N11
Reply.text: The oil field has gone dry. And it’s too dangerous to go to Khazif. You have guts, stranger. Help us, please!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N12
Reply.text: Do you want me to bring you a tank of oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13
Reply.text: Yes, we’ll give you a tank-truck and take care of your truck while you are away.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13b
Reply.text: Sounds dangerous. I don’t want to get involved in it.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13a
Reply.text: Ok. But please don’t touch anything on my truck!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: Have you got it?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02b
Reply.text: No, something urgent came up. But I’ll get it for you.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02
Reply.text: Here’s your cargo.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: Damn. Crude oil is no good for our trucks and the mechanic who distills oil for us has gone.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N04
Reply.text: What happened to him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N05
Reply.text: He didn’t like us, I guess. He might listen to you, though. Please, get him back.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N06
Reply.text: Where will I find him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N07
Reply.text: There aren’t many places to go around here. All villages are burnt down. He must have gone to Alikham.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N08
Reply.text: I’ll bring him back. By that time I hope you’ll have some information about the elders. I really need to talk to them.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N01
Reply.text: Will you do it for us?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N03
Reply.text: The oil! Will you bring us the oil?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04b
Reply.text: I’ve got more important things to do.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04a
Reply.text: All right, I’ll do it.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: What are you looking for?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Have you seen the mechanic from the other town here?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: Yes, I saw him. He was all disheveled and acted really strange.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N04
Reply.text: Where has he gone from here?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N05
Reply.text: He went further down the road.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N06
Reply.text: Thanks.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N01
Reply.text: Please, don’t touch me.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N02
Reply.text: I’m not going to harm you.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N03
Reply.text: I don’t trust anyone. People do crazy things around here!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N04
Reply.text: Why is that?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N05
Reply.text: I know nothing and I don’t want to talk to you.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N06
Reply.text: The old chap has gone out of his mind. I guess I’ll have to take him to Kef anyway. I don’t think he’ll be of much help to its people, though.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07
Reply.text: You won’t dare. Let me go! I want to know, if there are other living people in this world. I’m not coming back to Kef, no way!!!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07b
Reply.text: But why?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08b
Reply.text: I found the truth. And it’s more than I can bear. But I can’t live in lie either.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09b
Reply.text: Listen, your car will make it through the desert. Go to the north-west and you will find towns there, full of life and happy people. Perhaps you’ll restore your piece of mind there sooner, among the green pastures.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N10b
Reply.text: Are you saying there are other survivors? And you’re letting me go? Thank you so much.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N11b
Reply.text: What am I going to say in Kef?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07a
Reply.text: I’ll have to use force then.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08a
Reply.text: I’d rather die!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09a
Reply.text: Damn. What scared him so much? And what am I going to say in Kef?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: I don’t see the mechanic. You didn’t find him?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: He won’t come back. He scared himself to death.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: Sad news. But I believe you’ve done everything you could.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: So, you’ll tell me where to find your elders?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N05
Reply.text: Yes, we found their village. The old men live on the coast. We’ll send another rescue party after them as soon as we recover from the last attack. Our elders need proper houses and care, which we are willing to give them.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N06
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll make sure they know it.

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_1_N01
Reply.text: They found us! Run for your lives!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000072
Reply.text: Wait! I’ve come with peace.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000073
Reply.text: That one looks quite normal. How did you find us?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000074
Reply.text: A kind man from the town showed me the way. He said a rescue party will soon arrive after you.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000075
Reply.text: The moment I dreaded has come. There’s no point in hiding anymore. We’ll have to fight that battle, brothers.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000076
Reply.text: What are you talking about? They only want...

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000077
Reply.text: Don’t you get it? I’ll tell you our story, drive in.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000080
Reply.text: There’s no time for stories. We are under attack!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000078
Reply.text: Tell me what’s happening here!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000079
Reply.text: Years ago this was a thriving region. We recovered from the catastrophe soon enough, and we thought we could start our life afresh. But people started to act really strange. One day they would be overjoyed, the next day they would have this evil look in their eyes.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000081
Reply.text: I think I begin to understand.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000082
Reply.text: People tried to control their emotions, but one day it all collapsed. A man killed his family and had no memory of doing it. He was executed, but ever since that day fear took a strong grip of our hearts. We couldn’t trust our relatives. We couldn’t trust ourselves.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000083
Reply.text: So, there are no bandits, demons of the desert?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000084
Reply.text: I’m afraid not. People with similar cycles of madness united to attack other groups. Only few survived. They build towns and destroy them the next day.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000085
Reply.text: But how could you avoid the madness?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000086
Reply.text: We were too old to feel powerful emotions at the time of the Catastrophe. Strong emotions are for the young; our part is to keep memories and mourn the dead. When we realized what happened, we left the cities to hide from the young. But it couldn’t last long. We’ve been disclosed and they are going to kill us now. I feel them approaching.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000087
Reply.text: I won’t let you die until you tell me everything you know about Ivan!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000088
Reply.text: Too late. They are attacking.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000089
Reply.text: I’ll fight on your side.

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_2_N01
Reply.text: We won this battle, but they are going to be back. It’s just a matter of time.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000091
Reply.text: What are we gonna do? I can’t just leave you here, can I? How can I get you out of here?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000092
Reply.text: There is a port nearby, but there aren’t any ships there. The machinery looks working, though.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000093
Reply.text: I’ve got a device for calling a rescue ship. You’ll be evacuated to the lands where people are normal. At least more normal than here.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000094
Reply.text: I can’t believe our luck.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Show me the port and I’ll call the ship.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N01
Reply.text: Stay where you are, infidel! Why have you come to the sacred land of the Oracle?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N02
Reply.text: I’ve come to the Oracle to get an answer to my question.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N03
Reply.text: Only the believers can see Him!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N042
Reply.text: I want to be a believer. Let me join your community.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N052
Reply.text: You want the right thing. But are you ready to make a sacrifice to prove us your resolution?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N062
Reply.text: I’ll do what it takes to be initiated.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N072
Reply.text: You’ll have to sacrifice your weapon first. A man who kills is not worthy of seeing the Oracle.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N082
Reply.text: But that’ll make me an easy prey in the forthcoming trip.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N092
Reply.text: The almighty Oracle will protect you in your journey.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1022
Reply.text: You are asking too much. Is there any other way to see the Oracle?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1122
Reply.text: There is always another way, but it’s hard and full of dangers.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1222
Reply.text: I'm used to taking risks. Tell me, what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1322
Reply.text: Bring us the head of the steel monster that is guarding the entrance to the town of the living dead.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1422
Reply.text: Sounds impressive, even though I don’t believe fairy-tales. How do I defeat the guard?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1522
Reply.text: Try luring him to a one-on-one combat. That’s your only chance to defeat it. And even then it’s only a slim chance.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000201
Reply.text: I’d rather kill you!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16222
Reply.text: It’s a hard choice, but I guess I’ll sacrifice my weapon.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000202
Reply.text: Wise decision. The gracious Oracle will share his wisdom with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000203
Reply.text: I hope his advice is worth all that trouble.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16221
Reply.text: I’ll bring you the head of the monster!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1021
Reply.text: All right. You can take the weapon.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1121
Reply.text: I greet you, brother. You can go to the Oracle now and ask him your question.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000204
Reply.text: I hope I did the right thing.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N041
Reply.text: Get out of my way! I have no time to talk to you.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N051
Reply.text: He’s threatening us, brothers! Attack the infidel!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000195
Reply.text: There seems to be no peaceful solution here.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N01
Reply.text: Did you kill the monster?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N022
Reply.text: Here’s his head. I’ve done my part of the deal.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N032
Reply.text: I greet you, brother! You can go to the Oracle and ask him your question now.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N042
Reply.text: That’s exactly why I came here.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N021
Reply.text: I couldn’t defeat it yet.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N01
Reply.text: How dare you trouble me, mortal?! Gods speak through me and I couldn’t care less about humans.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P02
Reply.text: Answer my question and sleep on.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N03
Reply.text: You aren’t one of the priests, are you? My prophecies are a valuable gift, and I will ask a lot in return. Are you ready for that?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P04
Reply.text: I’ve crossed the world to get here and I’m not turning back now. Tell me what you need.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N05
Reply.text: I need two artifacts from the fortress of the steel monsters, or as the silly people call it – from the town of the dead. I usually ask for one artifact, but you’ve got a truck and I see the scars from many combats on it.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P06
Reply.text: What sort of artifacts?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N07
Reply.text: You’ll know when you see them. If not, then you are not worthy of my help. Off you go!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P08
Reply.text: I’ll be back soon.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N01
Reply.text: Good job, wanderer.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P02
Reply.text: Yes, I’ve brought what you asked.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N03
Reply.text: My project will finally take off. Let’s consider it gods’ blessing. I’ll listen to your story.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P042
Reply.text: My father was killed. I want to find the murderers and punish them.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N052
Reply.text: Problems of the mortal do not concern me, but I promised to help you. I need information for analysis. Tell me everything you know.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P062
Reply.text: My house was attacked by some people from the east, from the other side of the Death Desert. I’ve got to find them, but no one knows how to survive in that eerie place.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N072
Reply.text: A man of flesh will not survive there long. But what’s in your hands?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P082
Reply.text: It’s a disc that belonged to my father. They say you can read it. Perhaps it’ll help me find the murderers and understand their motives.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P041
Reply.text: My father’s name is Ivan Go, he was an Explorer. Several years ago he disappeared without a trace and I was adopted by a friend of his. A few months ago my village was burnt down. No one survived...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N051
Reply.text: I didn’t hear your question. Do you want to know who attacked your village? Do you seek revenge?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P061
Reply.text: Yes. I mean, no. I think my father is still alive and I want to find him. I’m sure the attack on my village is somehow connected with his disappearance.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N071
Reply.text: I see. I don’t know Ivan Go’s whereabouts. I’m sorry you’ve gone all that way, pilgrim. Good bye.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P081
Reply.text: I haven’t come here empty-handed. Here’s a disc that belonged to my father. They say you can read it. Perhaps it contains some clues.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N01
Reply.text: I haven’t seen anything of the kind for a long time. And I don’t recall anybody coming to me with such a question. However, in the very beginning there was something...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N02
Reply.text: That’s my only hope.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N03
Reply.text: The artifacts you’ve brought will help. It might work out. But you’ve got to help me remember.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N04
Reply.text: Just tell me what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N05
Reply.text: Concentrate the energy of the spheres, so that the celestial light...

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N06
Reply.text: Save your riddles for the locals, just tell me what I need to do.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N07
Reply.text: Take three of my little helpers to the three menhirs. Here, here and here. They will configure my remote memory modules. But make sure the savages who worship me don’t interfere.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N08
Reply.text: I’m leaving immediately. I’ve got hope now!
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m2_OracleMemory'); TActivate('trVK1'); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot1' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot2' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot3' ); GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity(0); EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N01
Reply.text: My functionality increased significantly with the application of new modules. I haven’t checked all systems yet. It’ll take a while.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N02
Reply.text: But is there just anything you can tell for sure me after all those tasks?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N031
Reply.text: Indeed. The disc really belonged to Ivan Go. It’s a diary that contains a lot of information about our world.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N041
Reply.text: Come on, read the final entries!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N051
Reply.text: Reading the contents... The final entry: [Preparations for the expedition].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N061
Reply.text: Yes, that’s it. Read on!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N071
Reply.text: The information is protected by a complex cipher. Unless you’ve got a key, the deciphering may take a few years, which is unacceptable for you, as I can see.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N081
Reply.text: What key?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N091
Reply.text: Judging the cipher and the password length, with 96,7% probability it’s another disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N101
Reply.text: You must be kidding! I’ve come here to get an answer to my question, not to be sent away to look for a stupid piece of plastic!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N111
Reply.text: Seek and you will find. It’s probably among Ivan’s stuff.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N121
Reply.text: I guess I should visit father’s house again.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N032
Reply.text: Judging by the contents, the disc contains the scheme of the device that allows you to cross the radioactive desert among other things.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N042
Reply.text: Great! Go on.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N052
Reply.text: The disc also contains a lot of information about a man called Ivan Go.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N062
Reply.text: Turns out, we were right and my deceased father was closely connected with that man.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N072
Reply.text: However, the information is protected by a complex cipher. Unless you’ve got a key, the deciphering may take a few years, which is unacceptable for you, as I can see.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N082
Reply.text: What key?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N092
Reply.text: Judging by the cipher and the password length, 96,7% probability it’s another disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N102
Reply.text: Where am I to find it?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N112
Reply.text: Ask the girl who came with you. She’ll tell you. Good bye.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N122
Reply.text: Wait up! I haven’t finished with you! He’s gone... Looks like I’ll have to ask Lisa a few questions.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N01
Reply.text: You’ve returned with the key.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N02
Reply.text: Yes, here’s the second disc.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N03
Reply.text: Give it to me and wait for the answer.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N04
Reply.text: All right.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05b
Reply.text: You were right about the disc: it’s your father’s diary. I need some time to analyze the whole data, but I can give you the general answers now.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06b
Reply.text: Tell me where to find him?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05a
Reply.text: You were right about the disc: it’s Ivan Go’s diary, where he describes his journeys and discoveries. It will take a while to analyze it all, but I can answer general questions right away.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06a
Reply.text: Has Ivan been in the death desert? The disc should have some hints how to cross the sands!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N07a
Reply.text: The final entry says: ‘I’ve never been so close to my objective before. I’ve got everything I need for the trip. There must be people on the other side of the desert, but I couldn’t care less. They might show me the way, though. If my plan works out, the world will change for the better. If not – I’ve got nothing to lose anyway’.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N08a
Reply.text: I was sure we would find what we need here. Read on!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N09a
Reply.text: The disc had a scheme I’ll make you a copy of. Show it to a skilled mechanic and he’ll make a device for you. Using it, you will be able to cross the desert.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N10a
Reply.text: I just need to find a mechanic now. I hope there are some in Midgard.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N11a
Reply.text: No doubts, you want to know what else the diary contains. But the data from the disc can become a dangerous weapon in the hands of the ignorant. When time comes, I’ll share the information with the humanity!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000205
Reply.text: You lied to me! I'm glad I got some information from you at all.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N01
Reply.text: It’s been a while since somebody came to visit me… What brought you here?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N02
Reply.text: Your friend from Seth asked me to give you this package.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N03
Reply.text: You’ve made my day, young man! These were the times… And now they only fight, shoot each other and damage my fields.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N04
Reply.text: Yes, it’s hard times, indeed. Whatever happened to your fields?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N05
Reply.text: Somebody trampled my crops. They drove across it or burnt it – and left strange signs behind.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N06
Reply.text: I think I saw something of the kind before. Show me your field.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N07
Reply.text: It’s a stone’s throw from here – turn right as you go from here. It was nice talking to you. And thanks for the package!

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N08
Reply.text: You’re welcome. I’ll go have a look at the signs on your field.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N01
Reply.text: What are you looking for in these forgotten lands?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N02
Reply.text: I’m looking for the Oracle.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N03
Reply.text: You’ve come to the wrong place. The Oracle is in the north-west from here. Now I have to go: I need to bring my fields back to it’s normal state.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N04
Reply.text: What happened to your fields?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001293
Reply.text: Someone trampled on my crops: either on a truck, or set it on fire - and left strange traces.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001294
Reply.text: Seems like I’ve seen something similar before. Show me where your crops are, I know people who might be interested in this phenomenon.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001295
Reply.text: They are very close, to the right of the exit. Thank you in advance: for the fields and for the conversation.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001296
Reply.text: I’ll be glad to help.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001297
Reply.text: Ïðèâåòñòâóþ òåáÿ, ïóòíèê.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001298
Reply.text: I need your help. We've got some irresolvable issues with Oracle’s disciples and now...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001299
Reply.text: As much as I know, Oracle’s disciples treat you like a maggot. If you pay me 15 percent of your money, I can help you to regain some respect among them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001301
Reply.text: I’d rather not.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001300
Reply.text: I agree!

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard2_1_N01
Reply.text: Cease fire! We’re no better than our enemies. I’m sorry, stranger; we mistook you for somebody else.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P02
Reply.text: I’m OK. What sort of place is this? And why are you attacking passers-by?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: The world is full of danger: steel monsters are waking up and killing everyone on their way. They look a lot like your truck.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P04
Reply.text: Thanks for the warning. I’ll be careful.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: What brought you here?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P06
Reply.text: I’m looking for the Oracle.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: Only the High Druid can help you in your quest. Go to Seth, but be careful – the road is full of steel monsters.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N01
Reply.text: I greet you in our sacred grove, stranger.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative') if QuestStatus('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TakeQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid') end CompleteQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P02
Reply.text: Good day to you, High Druid. They told me you know how to get to the Oracle. I really need to talk to him.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N03
Reply.text: Are you sure you can handle the information the Oracle gives you? Prove me that you can handle it and I’ll show you the way to the Oracle.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P04
Reply.text: Try me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N05
Reply.text: Our sanctuary has been desecrated. Cleanse it, so that we can carry out our rites in the name of mother-earth.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P06
Reply.text: What happened there?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N07
Reply.text: Steel monsters that are hostile to anything living are destroying forests around the holy tree. They’ll soon get to the holy tree! Stop them!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P08
Reply.text: I’ve come out of many combats with victory. I don’t see why this one should be different.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_N01
Reply.text: Is our sanctuary free from the monsters?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_P02
Reply.text: Not yet, but I’m getting there.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N01
Reply.text: I knew that foreigners are not to be trusted.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P02
Reply.text: But I’ve done what you asked!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N03
Reply.text: I don’t know what you’ve done, but it only enraged the enemy. The monsters followed you and are approaching our town now!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P04
Reply.text: The scraps of iron turned out to be cleverer than I thought. But I’ll keep my word – the enemy will be defeated.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N05
Reply.text: It’s not enough to kill the enemy. We’ve got to make sure that a new one will not take its place.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P06
Reply.text: I see. Do you know where the monsters’ lair is?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N07
Reply.text: Our scouts reported that the monsters are coming from a hole in the ground that appeared in the north-east after the latest earthquake.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P08
Reply.text: Looks like the only way to stop them is to block the cave.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N09
Reply.text: We thought about it. We’d call to the mother earth to devour the hateful creatures. To be able to do that, we need to come really close to the hole. We’ve got no volunteers here.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P10
Reply.text: Consider you’ve got one now. What exactly do you want me to do?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N11
Reply.text: Place the praying stone by the hole and quickly leave that place. You may get hurt if you linger.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P12
Reply.text: I’ll come back with victory. And you’d better be ready to tell me about the Oracle.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N01
Reply.text: The monsters left our land. Thank you!!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P02
Reply.text: I’ve done enough to prove my loyalty to druids, haven’t I?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N03
Reply.text: The Oracle lives in the North. The secret path to the Oracle starts right here.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P04
Reply.text: I’ll sure find him now. Good bye.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001291
Reply.text: Oh, and one more thing. Before leaving, could you drop in on Brother Finnie? He seems to have business with you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001292
Reply.text: OK, I will think about it.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Alert! The enemy is attacking from the rear. Fire!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P022
Reply.text: Hold it! I’ve come with peace.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P021
Reply.text: If you want to speak the language of guns, let it be.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: You are riding a steed of steel. Greetings, friend!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindMoreNative'); SetTolerance(1100, 1019, RS_NEUTRAL); if QuestStatus('r3m1_FindMoreNative')==Q_TAKEN then AddHistory( 'r3_Fist_Fight_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); else AddHistory( 'r3_v2_Uluk_FirstTime_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); end

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: I need to meet the Oracle.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: The Oracle’s location is hidden from us. Only the druids know it and they use it to their own benefit.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: I guess I’ll have to talk to the druids then.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Wait. They won’t talk unless you offer them a lot of money. And besides. Unlike us, they are aggressive towards strangers. Help us capture their High Druid and you’ll get all the information you need. Lure him out of town and we’ll do the rest. Got it?

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P062
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do. But if anything goes wrong – we don’t know each other.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P061
Reply.text: It’s out of the question! I’m not a traitor.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: You’ve really helped us. The high druid was the final obstacle on our way. Now the machines will enter our life and make it better!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P02
Reply.text: I really need to see the Oracle.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: The druid told us how to get there. Thanks for the help and here’s your reward.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P04
Reply.text: I got what I wanted, but I’m not sure I did the right thing.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N01
Reply.text: What happened, stranger? You look worried.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P022
Reply.text: People from Uluk are plotting to kill you. They sent me to lure you out of the town.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N032
Reply.text: You’ve done the right thing by telling me about their plans. Come in and be my guest.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P042
Reply.text: I’d hate to be involved in a betrayal. Besides, you’ve got the information I need.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N052
Reply.text: Have I? What is it that you want to know?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P062
Reply.text: The reason I’ve come here is the Oracle. He’s the only one who can answer my question.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P021
Reply.text: We were attacked by wild animals. My friend is wounded and he can’t move. I left him nearby. Help us!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N031
Reply.text: I’ll help you, stranger!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P041
Reply.text: Follow me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: We haven’t heard from Uluk people for a couple of weeks now. Help us find out what happened there!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: Why don’t you go there?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Not all monsters are defeated yet, it’s way too dangerous to go out. You are the only one who can move fast enough.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P042
Reply.text: I’ve got more important things to do.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P041
Reply.text: All right, I’ll sort it out.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: A guest on a steel steed is our friend.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: What happened to you, people? Why did you forget your neighbors?

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: We don’t need help from arrogant druids. Tell them to stay away from us. We found more powerful gods. They are stronger than stone and their rage is greater than lightning.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: I’ll pass your message to them. Is there anything else I can do?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N01
Reply.text: I’ll tell you what you can do, stranger. Our village is dying and the people are suffering. Not everyone has gone mad, though. Lots of people are against the changes, but they are afraid of the monsters’ rage. The strongest ones have left, but they won’t reach Seth alone.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P02
Reply.text: What’s going to happen to you?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N03
Reply.text: I’m staying here. I’ve got to find out what causes this machine-craze and talk some sense into the elder.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P042
Reply.text: Why should I care? Solve your own problems.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P041
Reply.text: I’ll help them. May luck be with you too. Good bye.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m1_RescueUlukCivil'); CreateTeam('RescueCars',1064,CVector(getPos('RescueCiv_loc')),{'r1m1_bug02','DemoMolokovoz1'}); TActivate('trRescArmyPlace'); TActivate('trRescArmyDie'); TActivate('trWentCivCamp'); SetTolerance(1100,1064,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1019,1064,RS_ALLY); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(1); SetVar('BezhenAlive', 0) EndConversation();

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: What happened in Uluk?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P022
Reply.text: The elder came to believe the new gods and he worships metal monsters now.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N032
Reply.text: Bad news. You’ve earned your reward, though. Go with peace.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P042
Reply.text: Good bye.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P021
Reply.text: The elder came to believe the new gods and he worships metal monsters now. Those people will explain it to you.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N031
Reply.text: You’ve changed our opinion of the foreigners. Here’s your reward. If you happen to be near, drop by. You can always rely on our help.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P041
Reply.text: Thank you. I’m glad there are people who live in harmony with nature.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N01
Reply.text: You are back already! What did the Oracle tell you? Do you know how to cross the desert?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N02
Reply.text: I got more questions, rather than answers after my visit to the Oracle. At least I know we are on the right way. Tell me where I can find other discs, like the one I’ve given to the Oracle? Is there anybody I can talk to about Ivan Go?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N03
Reply.text: Of all people, only Ben Throttle may know something about him. He lives near Midgard. He’s an old explorer and a friend of Ivan. He should be able to help you.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N04
Reply.text: I’ve got to meet him then. Show me the way.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N01
Reply.text: Don’t pass by, stranger. I’ve got a special offer for people like you!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N02
Reply.text: You got me interested. What is it?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N03
Reply.text: Only today! You can get the map of this area! And it’s almost free!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N04
Reply.text: How much is that ‘almost free’?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N05
Reply.text: It’s only 50 coins. And not a coin less.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06c
Reply.text: Thanks, but no, thanks. I can do without your map.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06b
Reply.text: I’ll take it for 30 coins and we’ll part friends.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N07b
Reply.text: I told you: the price is final. 50 coins and not a coin less.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08bb
Reply.text: Whatever. Find other fools to buy your stupid map.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08ba
Reply.text: All right, all right. Here are your 50 coins.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06a
Reply.text: I’m gonna need the map. It’s a deal.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N01
Reply.text: I heard that you are going to the Oracle.
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('q_VisitDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN and QuestStatus('r3m1_ClearSanctuary_ReturnDruid2')==Q_COMPLETED and not(IsQuestTaken('q_PlaceWithSign')) and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N02
Reply.text: You heard right. I really need its advice.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N03
Reply.text: Could you do me a favor?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04b
Reply.text: I’m sorry, but I’ve enough problems on my mind.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04a
Reply.text: Sure, what can I do for you?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N05a
Reply.text: A good friend of mine has gone off in search of the Oracle and never came back. They say he’s made a new home there, not far from the Oracle. If you see him, drop by and give him a package from me.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N06a
Reply.text: Where exactly does he live?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N07a
Reply.text: Right here, by the old road.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N08a
Reply.text: I’ll pass him your message and your package.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N01
Reply.text: I see you are a good man, stranger. Take that book about the history of our land.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N02
Reply.text: I’m not interested in history.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N03
Reply.text: I hate killing people…

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N04
Reply.text: It was an honor to talk to you and thanks for the book. I’ll treasure it.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N05
Reply.text: That’s better. You can go now.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N06
Reply.text: Thanks. Good bye!

Reply.name: Aborigen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You got me, demons! First my fields and now you want to take me! I’m not giving in easily!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000549
Reply.text: Good evening to you, too.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000550
Reply.text: You’re one of them – I saw you on the burning field.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001159
Reply.text: Another harmless madman…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000551
Reply.text: Don’t worry, good man. The power of science will drive demons from your fields. I saw it happen before.

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I greet you, lost soul. I see the void in your heart that has to be filled with faith. Help our church and you’ll be blessed.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001133
Reply.text: I’m not sure I need it. But what exactly do you want me to do?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001247
Reply.text: Spiritual balance of our congregation has been disturbed by two pagans. They are confusing the minds of our people with heresy. Kill the heretics and bring their heads to me. It’ll restore spiritual harmony of our people. And you will receive a blessing and a generous reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001249
Reply.text: I can do without your blessing.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001248
Reply.text: I agree to help the church.

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you done it?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001252
Reply.text: I haven’t found the heretics yet.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001251
Reply.text: Yes, here are the heads of the two heretics. They’ll no longer sow discord among your people.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001250
Reply.text: Here’s your reward. I bless you to act in the name of our church! May fortune be on your side.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001253
Reply.text: Thank you.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_ReturnHeadsQuest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head1'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head2'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 2 ); AddPlayerMoney( 1000 ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hey, man, could you deliver some stuff to a nearby village? For money, of course. I could go there myself, but I’m too busy now collecting trophies on the battlefields.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001259
Reply.text: I’m too busy to drive around with your stuff!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001135
Reply.text: Sounds like a cushy job. Load your stuff.

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You’ve brought me that engine. Thanks! And here’s your money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001255
Reply.text: Money is good, but what I don’t get is why am I carrying this broken engine around?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001254
Reply.text: It’s business, pal. I cannot tell you my secrets.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001256
Reply.text: Smells fishy…

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg2
Reply.text: It’s you again. What’s up?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001261
Reply.text: I still don’t understand, what’s the point of taking this broken engine back and forth? Tell me your secret.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001263
Reply.text: It’ll cost you 2000 to satisfy your curiosity.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001260
Reply.text: That’s way too much. I’m not that desperate to hear it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001264
Reply.text: That must be a hell of a secret for 2 grand! Spit it out!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001262
Reply.text: I collect car parts that are left on the battlefield and send them to my friend repairman. He replaces the good parts in the cars that he fixes with the ones that I send him and returns me the good ones, which I sale at a very high price. That’s how we make our living.|Now that you know it, I’ll have to kill you. Ha-ha-ha! Got ya! Go with peace and don’t even think of using our scheme.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001265
Reply.text: Clever enough.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: That’s the engine I’ve been waiting for so long. Here’s your reward, stranger.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001137
Reply.text: Easy money.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Could you take this engine back to Marezzia? You’ll get paid, of course.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001258
Reply.text: Do you take me for a fool? I’m not going there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001257
Reply.text: It doesn’t matter what I do, as long as I get paid for doing it.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000452
Reply.text: They told me I can get a job and some answers to my questions here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000453
Reply.text: You might as well. Who are you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000454
Reply.text: I’m new here: I’ve come from the east. I’ve heard a lot about your leader, Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000455
Reply.text: Oh, yes. He’s a great man! There’s nothing that he can’t do.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000456
Reply.text: I’d like to meet him in person.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000457
Reply.text: It would be very hard to do. He doesn’t come out to meet ordinary people because of the murderous assaults.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000458
Reply.text: Isn’t there absolutely no way to meet him? I’ve been waiting for it all my life.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000459
Reply.text: I said it would be ‘hard’, but I didn’t say ‘impossible’. Axel awards war heroes in person. Join our army and prove yourself a great warrior. That way you’ll get a chance to shake hands with Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000460
Reply.text: Who are you fighting with?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000461
Reply.text: Our enemies are the northerners. They turned their backs on us when we really needed their help, so we have no pity for them anymore. Axel will lead us to the era of prosperity, and only the miserable neighbors are standing in our way. Not for long now, not for long…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000462
Reply.text: I see.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000463
Reply.text: So, are you with us or against us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000465
Reply.text: I’m with you, of course. I’ll try to do something that wins me a chance of meeting Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000468
Reply.text: Start with small things. We’ve got to keep the enemy at bay. Go to the border and attack everything that’s moving. Stay tuned.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000469
Reply.text: Yes!
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('SNGPROVIANT'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r2_AR_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000464
Reply.text: Perhaps, there is another way to meet Axel…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000466
Reply.text: Suit yourself. But in that case, leave our land as soon as you can. We don’t like people who waste out time with pointless talk.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000467
Reply.text: Fair enough.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready to give up your life for the Crimson Dawn?

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg2
Reply.text: The operation has been successful. We got hold of an important strategic object, while you were distracting the enemy. Take your part of the trophies.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000472
Reply.text: That was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000473
Reply.text: The next task is going to be more complicated. Go to the enemy’s lands and blow up their caravan with provision. The trophies are yours, as usual.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000474
Reply.text: That’s my kind of job.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You’ve done great harm to the northerners’ economics. The rest will be easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000476
Reply.text: When am I going to see Axel?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000477
Reply.text: Not so fast. Keep on serving our people and he will award you. Our friends – monks want to get to know you. They boost the morale of our warriors with their prayers and… great wine. Go to the monastery and bring some bottles of that spirit-rising drink.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000478
Reply.text: What a silly thing to do in the time of war!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000479
Reply.text: The power of faith is underrated these days.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000480
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg4
Reply.text: It took you a long time. Have you brought the wine?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000502
Reply.text: Yes, the barrels are in the truck.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000504
Reply.text: Good. You don’t need to tell me anything. I’m afraid of the monks myself. Anyway, let’s get down to business. We know that there are traitors among us.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000505
Reply.text: Who are they?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000506
Reply.text: It’s the rebels who are unhappy about the regime. They corrupt our economics from inside. They are like worms that slowly kill the tree by gnawing on its bark. We know the location of their base. The rebels are not expecting an attack, so they should be an easy target. You’ve got to kill them all.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000507
Reply.text: Killing the unarmed… What if I refuse?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000508
Reply.text: In that case, we’ll declare you a traitor.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000509
Reply.text: I’ll carry out your order.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg5
Reply.text: What are the results of the negotiations?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000526
Reply.text: The Defense Leaders agreed to meet me here.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000527
Reply.text: It sounds too easy. The enemy is treacherous, so it may easily be a trap. We should go there and fight, anyway.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000528
Reply.text: I’d like to take part in the operation.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Good day, my son. You’ve done a lot for the common cause. We’d like to know you better.
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FindROMinCastle') and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FindROMinCastle')) and IsQuestComplete('d_SinFather_Quest') and not(IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FightFelix')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FightFelix'))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000482
Reply.text: I don’t understand what you are talking about.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000483
Reply.text: A traveler dropped by and told us that he knows you…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000484
Reply.text: Who’s that? I don’t understand what you are talking about.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000485
Reply.text: He also said that you swore to exterminate all bandits in the world…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000486
Reply.text: That’s a lie! I…I’ve nothing against bandits… I’m a bandit myself.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000487
Reply.text: I believe you, my son. But the charges are serious enough, and we’ve got to figure out who’s telling the truth and who’s lying. May God be your judge… in the death match on the arena! The innocent man will win.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000490
Reply.text: So, who am I going to fight with?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000491
Reply.text: Old Felix.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000492
Reply.text: What? Felix???

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Good day, my son. You’ve done a lot for the common cause. We’d like to know you better

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000489
Reply.text: I’ve got nothing to hide. Ask your questions.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000493
Reply.text: We don’t need to ask you questions. One look is enough to decide if you are worthy or not. We test everyone who joins our crusade. That’s the secret of our invincible army.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000494
Reply.text: So what about me?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000495
Reply.text: You are a hard nut to crack. One thing is certain: you are bringing changes. Some people say we should kill you at once. But I think you should live.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000496
Reply.text: Good to hear that, but what makes you think so?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000497
Reply.text: Our mission is not slaughter in this region. It’s something higher than that. So is your mission. Leave with peace and don’t forget the wine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000498
Reply.text: It’s good to talk to sensible people, not fanatics.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You’ve proved you were right. You can go back and don’t forget the wine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000500
Reply.text: Sure, that’s what I came here for.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg3
Reply.text: The holy voice brought you to our abode.

Reply.name: Mopl_he
Reply.text: I know Lisa is here. Give her to me, or I’ll destroy this place!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000538
Reply.text: We have nothing against you. Stop shouting.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000539
Reply.text: You’ve no authority here after Axel’s defeat. If I don’t destroy this place, somebody else will do it. I’m going to attack you on the count of three. One… Two…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000540
Reply.text: Open up your eyes, my boy. Turn around and you’ll see that she’s leaving the monastery.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000541
Reply.text: Damn!

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who are you, stranger, and what do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000511
Reply.text: I punish traitors of Axel’s cause.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000512
Reply.text: We mean you no harm. We are fighting for the right cause. Have mercy upon us! We’ve got families at home…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000514
Reply.text: I’m not a murderer. Run, before I changed my mind.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000515
Reply.text: Thank you! We are going to Librium, but I’ve got to pass some information to the leaders of the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000516
Reply.text: I don’t belong to the Crimson Dawn anymore. I’m a fugitive too. Get in, I’ll give you a lift.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000513
Reply.text: Die, in the name of the Crimson Dawn!

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I’m the leader of the rebels. Have you come after me?

Reply.name: Lag_hlg08871
Reply.text: I’ve got to take you to Helvetia. You’d better know something that’s really important.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg0
Reply.text: The night is long…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000520
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. I’ve got intelligence of the imminent operation against the Independent Towns.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000521
Reply.text: We’ll help you in return for the intelligence.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000522
Reply.text: My information is too important to tell it to an agent - I’ll speak to the higher ranks only. I can’t risk. I know something that will give us a major advantage in the war.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000523
Reply.text: Fair enough. Our leaders will meet you here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000524
Reply.text: I’ll be right there.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I don’t think I know you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000542
Reply.text: The night is long…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000543
Reply.text: But the dawn is near. Hello, comrade.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000544
Reply.text: I’ve come to discuss our plans.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000546
Reply.text: Thank God, you’ve arrived. Our leader will be here in 5 minutes and he will answer your questions. Good luck!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000547
Reply.text: The tyrant will be defeated.

Reply.name: Axel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I’m Axel. I heard you were looking for me?!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000533
Reply.text: I’m glad I met you at last! Can’t say it was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000534
Reply.text: I respect your determination, but I’m afraid you won’t survive our meeting. I’d like to test you and see if you are as strong and dexterous, as they say.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000535
Reply.text: I’m ready for any tests, as long as they serve my end.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000530
Reply.text: I’m glad I can finally look you in the eye, Axel. The truth is that I came here to take your life. Fight like a man!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000531
Reply.text: I accept the challenge, much as I hate to kill you. To the arena, my brothers!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000532
Reply.text: To the arena!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Need cash? I could use your skills.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001110
Reply.text: Go on…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001119
Reply.text: My house was looted a couple of days ago. The house-breakers took something really valuable to me – a work of art. Only an antiquities connoisseur could do such a thing. And there is only one man, besides myself who’s interested in that sort of thing around here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001121
Reply.text: Sounds like too much work. I don’t want to get involved in it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001120
Reply.text: Let’s teach the bastard a lesson.

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Oh, you’ve brought the masterpiece! Give it to me and take your money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001122
Reply.text: I might get a better price for that piece of art.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001116
Reply.text: Take your precious…

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001111
Reply.text: Let’s not beat about the bush. Was it you who stole the masterpiece from Aesthete?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001124
Reply.text: Yes, but… I don’t have it now. This man came to me and offered to steal a famous work of art for me. We worked out a plan of breaking into Aesthete’s house. I made the advance payment and never saw him again. I wish I hadn’t done that, but I wanted that work of art badly. Perhaps you will be able to find the guy who cheated both of us. He called himself Swindler. I met him in a canyon nearby. He might still be there.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001125
Reply.text: I’ll sure find him. But if you lied to me, I’ll come back for you.

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you got the masterpiece? Give it to me! I’ll pay generously.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001123
Reply.text: I prefer to keep it for the time being.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001118
Reply.text: Here it is.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: A source says that a rich caravan with few guards is going to the South. It’s a sure thing. We’ll share the loot 50/50. Deal?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001127
Reply.text: No way!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001114
Reply.text: Deal.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001126
Reply.text: I’ll be waiting for you with booty.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001128
Reply.text: I’ll be back.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: We are in luck! If we find the buyer, I… um, we’ll live on that money for the rest of our life. Damn it, it’s the Big Boss’s mark – no one in their right mind will buy it! And in case you didn’t know – people who steal from the Big Boss don’t live long…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001129
Reply.text: You can keep the booty. I don’t want to get involved in this. I don’t need troubles.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001112
Reply.text: Sounds like a lot of money. Who’s the Big Boss? We should get to him before he hears about the robbery.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001130
Reply.text: They say he lives in an unassailable fortress at the top of a mountain. I’ll hide the loot and lure the guards out. It’ll be your chance to get in and kill the Boss.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001131
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What do you want, my rescuer?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000448
Reply.text: Has Lisa been here?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000449
Reply.text: Yes, my lord. She left in a hurry and she was heading to Helvetia, as far as I know.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000450
Reply.text: She won’t get away from me!

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: I’m really busy now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000642
Reply.text: It’s urgent! You’ve got to switch off the electric power station. The destiny of the mankind depends on you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000648
Reply.text: Are you out of your mind? The station supplies several towns with energy. I’m not going to cut these people off electricity because of some crazy idea you got.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000649
Reply.text: Do you realize that the station supplies the enemies’ base as well?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000643
Reply.text: I don’t understand you. Come to think of it, there have been some energy leaks lately… Anyway, I’m not going to turn off the station.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000645
Reply.text: The future of the humanity is in your hands. All you need to do is turn off the station for a few seconds!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000647
Reply.text: Do you think it’s that simple? The emergency start will take hours! But then again, it’s time for maintenance inspection. Go look for your green men!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000651
Reply.text: You’ve done the world a great favor!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000644
Reply.text: I’ll blow up this hole! The guys from the Crimson Dawn will be more than happy to help me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000646
Reply.text: Easy, man. You are a war hero and you’ve probably got a psychological trauma. I’ll help you. See, the electricity is off!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000650
Reply.text: It’s your luck that I’m in good mood today. People like you drive me nuts when they stand in the way of saving the world.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What is it now?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000656
Reply.text: Have you noticed anything unusual lately? Any people acting strange?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000657
Reply.text: There’s an anomalous zone nearby, so people are often acting strange around here. Some of them say they saw metal objects in the sky.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000658
Reply.text: I really need to get there. Thanks for telling me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001268
Reply.text: Damn! That malfunction again. Go away! I'm busy repairing that station!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001269
Reply.text: All right.

Reply.name: SelBarmen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I haven’t seen you before.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz471
Reply.text: I’m a stranger here. I had to cross the mountains to get this far.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz472
Reply.text: The fact that you got through the tunnel says a lot about your battle skills. Have you come here to join the mercenaries?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz473
Reply.text: Not really. I don’t know much about your country and I don’t want to get involved in your conflicts.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz474
Reply.text: It’s a miracle! A war dog comes here for a reason other than killing people for money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz475
Reply.text: Live and let live, as they taught me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz476
Reply.text: Sooner or later, you’ll have to take sides. You can either be friend, or foe here. There’s no third option.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz477
Reply.text: Still, I want to work it out for myself, before I take sides in this war.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz478
Reply.text: Join us, warrior. We are fighting against the treacherous aggressors. We are fighting for the right cause.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz479
Reply.text: I want to make my own conclusions before I join somebody’s side. Let me take a look around.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz480
Reply.text: You know what? Go to Tous. People there will tell you everything you need to know about the aggressors. They might also help you in your search.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz481
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Are you ready to join our army?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz483
Reply.text: Tell me about the war.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz484
Reply.text: We are fighting for justice against the brute aggressors.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz485
Reply.text: I think I’ve heard it somewhere before. I’ll go look for answers someplace else.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz486
Reply.text: Hold on. Take this leaflet. Perhaps, when you know the history of this country better, your heart will tell you what to do next.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz487
Reply.text: I’ll leaf it through when I get a minute. The leaflet says horrible things! But what do I have to do with it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz488
Reply.text: We need every man who can wield a weapon. Things are looking really dark now. We’d be grateful for any help.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz489
Reply.text: The reason I came here is Axel. I need to see him, so you can say we have a common motive.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz490
Reply.text: Join our army. Together we have more chances of getting Axel. Which isn’t easy at all: we sent our best assassins to him, but they all failed.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz491
Reply.text: But why? What stopped them?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz492
Reply.text: Apart from the fact he is always surrounded by a bunch of bodyguards, and that you have to cross a hostile territory to reach him?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz493
Reply.text: Yes, apart from that.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz494
Reply.text: No one knows for sure where his hideout is. They say he turned an underground base into a blossoming town, but we haven’t found it yet. We haven’t, but we sure will. Are you with us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz496
Reply.text: We’ll do away with Axel’s tyranny together!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz499
Reply.text: Thank you, stranger. Your deeds will not be forgotten.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz500
Reply.text: When do I start?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz501
Reply.text: Immediately. Go patrol the border. Make sure no enemy scout crosses it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz502
Reply.text: You can rely on me.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); TActivate ('SERCHSIDELINE'); AddHistory( 'r2_SNG_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1016, RS_ALLY ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1015, RS_ENEMY ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz495
Reply.text: I need to think about it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz497
Reply.text: You are free to leave anytime, unlike us…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz498
Reply.text: Don’t push me. I’ve got my own head on my shoulders.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you willing to join us?

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg2
Reply.text: My people owe you their lives. You are a truly fearless fighter. We had to test you before sending you on a serious mission.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz504
Reply.text: Now you’ve seen me in battle. I’ll do what it takes to reach Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz505
Reply.text: Keep up the good job and you’ll be introduced to him. In the meantime our people need protection. Escort the caravan that delivers food to the neighborhood villages.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz506
Reply.text: Sounds easy enough.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz507
Reply.text: Don’t get off your guard for a minute. The enemy will try to leave us without provision. But you won’t be alone. Good luck!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz508
Reply.text: Everything’s gonna be all right.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg3
Reply.text: The provision will keep us going some more time. Thanks to you! The time of major changes has come.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz510
