Reply.text: Don’t get me wrong: it’s great to be of some help to you, but let’s not forget about the ultimate goal.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz511
Reply.text: Our enemies get support from the other side of the mountain range. But if we block the tunnel, we’ll cut them off reinforcement.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz512
Reply.text: Why haven’t you done it before? The tunnel is on your territory, isn’t it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz513
Reply.text: We had more important things to do: the war is not all about open confrontation. Now it’s time to block that artery of the enemy. Remember, it’s guarded by elite warriors.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz514
Reply.text: Do you call those elite? I’ve already defeated one of them and it wasn’t hard at all.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz515
Reply.text: That’s how they get new people join their ranks. They’ve told you what a cool guy you are and offered you to become on of them, haven’t they?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz516
Reply.text: Yes… Their exact words… They aren’t as simple as they let on.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz517
Reply.text: I’m afraid, we have no one to spare for this operation. You’ll be on your own.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz518
Reply.text: It isn’t the first time I work alone. Expect me with victory.

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Your actions speak volumes about you. It’s time to give you a truly challenging task.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000432
Reply.text: Let’s hear it.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000433
Reply.text: Our spies report that there is a growing resentment with the tyrant in the enemy’s camp. You’ve got get in touch with the rebels and find the weak spots in the enemy’s defense. It’s our chance, don’t miss it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000434
Reply.text: I’ll do my best. Where do I find the rebels?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000435
Reply.text: Meet their contact at Toscana Bar. The password is: ‘The night is long’, and the reply is: ‘But the dawn is near’.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000436
Reply.text: I got it. Expect me with victory.

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg1
Reply.text: The rebel you’ve saved told me something important. One of Axel’s generals will be passing this place with only a few guards. If we get him alive, we’ll have a lot of valuable information about the enemy.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000438
Reply.text: He will be caught. But we’ll need additional forces for the operation.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000439
Reply.text: We thought about it. Barrage trucks and war transport will be waiting in ambush.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000440
Reply.text: Good to hear that. I won’t fail you.

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You’ve brought us luck, foreigner. The general has told us a way to get to Axel past the guards and he also revealed the location and the access codes to the subterranean town.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000442
Reply.text: I dread to think just what you did to make him talk.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000443
Reply.text: You don’t want to know it. So, we are distracting the enemy and you are getting inside the secret town and killing Axel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000444
Reply.text: That’s what I came here for. Tell me, where do I go?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000445
Reply.text: Here, let me draw the safe way on your map. The main thing is to keep it all secret. Keep radio silence once we start the operation.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000446
Reply.text: Let’s do it.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N03
Reply.text: Suppose, I’m Homer. What do you want to know?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N05
Reply.text: Now you are talking. What do you want to know?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N07
Reply.text: It’s not that no one can find it, it’s that no one has returned alive. I guess I’m one of the few curious people who have gone that far.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N09
Reply.text: So, there is a passage behind the western swamp that leads to the seaside. That’s where I saw this huge thumping monster of a machine, with steam coming out of it. Thank God it was night, so I safely made it back.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N11
Reply.text: I’m telling you what I saw. I bet you, the monster is guarding something. If you want to see it, I’m the only one who can show you the safe way in the swamp.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N13
Reply.text: I get so softhearted after a few glasses! I’ll tell you where the shallow waters start. See this dead tree? That’s where it’s safe to cross the swamp.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P02
Reply.text: Good day. Do you know where I can find Homer?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P04
Reply.text: Let me buy you a glass or two and hear one of your famous stories.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P06
Reply.text: Barmen, give my friend something strong. So, Homer, tell me about the mysterious place you’ve been to that no one could find.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P08
Reply.text: Get to the point.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P10
Reply.text: I can’t believe I’ve gone so far to hear that nonsense!

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P12
Reply.text: I’m sorry, I overreacted. I really need to know what that monster is guarding. Do you know how to cross the swamp?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P14
Reply.text: Thank you, kind man.
Reply.scriptResult: if CanQuestBeGiven('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') then TakeQuest('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') end; CompleteQuest('FindGomerA_Quest1'); CompleteQuest('r1m3_FindVrata_KnowPlace'); SetCoordinateForQuest( 'd_FindOracul_Quest' , CVector(getPos('ToR3M1'))) EndConversation()

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_1_N01
Reply.text: You don’t often see new faces around here.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N01
Reply.text: Do you really want to hear one of my stories?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N03
Reply.text: A talk will go smoother, when you get something to drink.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N05
Reply.text: Ooh! You’ll see a dead tree – that’s where the safe trail starts. You can cross the swamp there.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P02
Reply.text: I need to get to the other side of the swamp. Do you know where it’s safe to cross it?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P04
Reply.text: Barman, give my friend something strong. So, Homer, how do I cross the swamp?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P06
Reply.text: Thanks. Barman, one more please.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: One more visitor from the continent.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Morning. But what’s that about sea?!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: You are in the capital of the free land! Do you see any sea here?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: Everyone knows that wind-bag. He harasses people with his fairy-tales when he gets drunk.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Try one of the fishing villages. Don’t look at me like that – all other villages are inhabited by fishermen. Our village is the only exception.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Good morning, people of the sea!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: This a fishing village, isn’t it?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P06
Reply.text: Not really. Sorry if I touched your patriotic feelings. I’m looking for old Homer. Ever heard of him?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P08
Reply.text: So, where do I find him?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P10
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll go look for him.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: I’ve got nothing to tell you.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Too bad.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: We are fishing here.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: I see.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N01
Reply.text: Hi. Why don’t you sit down and drink a glass of ananaga with me.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02b
Reply.text: Thanks, but I’ve got things to do.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02a
Reply.text: If you are buying it, I will.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N03a
Reply.text: Hem! I’m not gonna pay for your drinks!

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N04a
Reply.text: I’ll do without it.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N01
Reply.text: Hey, traveler. I can tell you a story if you’ve got some time to spare.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N02
Reply.text: Go on, I’m all ears.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N03
Reply.text: It happened a long long time ago…at…hrrrrrrr

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N04
Reply.text: Let him sleep. I’ll go now.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N01
Reply.text: I’m sitting here, feeling sorry for myself.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N02
Reply.text: Why’s that?

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N03
Reply.text: Life’s been hell lately…

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N04
Reply.text: Shit happens.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: The sea brings all sorts of people here… What’s up?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Hello!

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: He doesn’t live in one place for long; he is always on the go. You might find him in the northern village.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Hello, um… fishermen!

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Does Homer live here?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P06
Reply.text: Thanks.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000089
Reply.text: What do you want?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000090
Reply.text: I’m looking for a man, his name is Homer.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000091
Reply.text: Yeah, I know him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000092
Reply.text: Where can I find him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000093
Reply.text: He drives from one village to another, there’s no telling where he can be now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000094
Reply.text: Ok, I’ll drive on.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N01
Reply.text: What do you want from me?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N02
Reply.text: I need a special thing that looks like this one.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N03
Reply.text: I’ve got it. 100 coins are all I’ll ask for it.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N0c
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04b
Reply.text: I don’t have money.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04a
Reply.text: I agree.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: Would you help us?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Our storehouse has been captured by the locals.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N05
Reply.text: We don’t want to fall out with the locals, so we are asking you to do it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000088
Reply.text: Not interested.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P04
Reply.text: Why don’t you fight it back?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P06
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N01
Reply.text: Is the storehouse free now?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N03
Reply.text: That beast? I doubt it… Even imprisoned, he refuses to cooperate.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N05
Reply.text: A van has left the fishing village and is heading here.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P02
Reply.text: No, the damn locals are fighting like crazy. Perhaps talking to their leader will help?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P04
Reply.text: Where is he?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P06
Reply.text: Thanks, I’ll find him.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N01
Reply.text: Thanks for saving me. Who are you?

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N03
Reply.text: Thank you. You helped people of Hel defeat foreign merchants.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P02
Reply.text: Doesn’t matter. Get in; I’ll take you to your men.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P04
Reply.text: I’ve got my own motives, but I’m glad I was of help.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Stop! Who is it?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N02
Reply.text: It’s ok; I’m not your enemy.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: Let us decide that. Who are you?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N04
Reply.text: I’ve come here to talk to you about the storehouse.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: Ha! So, the traders realized that capturing our leader wasn’t a clever idea and they are ready to set him free?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N06
Reply.text: They’ve captured your leader, you say? That’s something I didn’t know…

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: We are living in difficult times. The storehouse is our only way of negotiation with the dirty merchants.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N08
Reply.text: What are you negotiating?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N09
Reply.text: We want them to release our leader. If they do it, we’ll leave the storehouse.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Too much trouble. It’d be easier to kill you all.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N10
Reply.text: All right, I’ll help you. Where is your leader?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N11
Reply.text: If we knew, he’d be free long ago. It’s your task – to find out where they’re keeping him.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N12
Reply.text: I’ll try to.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_N01
Reply.text: How is it going? Do you know where they keep our leader yet?
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('TRS_Quest2')==Q_COMPLETED and QuestStatus('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest4')~=Q_TAKEN and not(IsQuestTaken('TRS_Quest4')) and not(IsQuestTaken('KillExtremist_Quest1')) and not(IsQuestComplete('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest1'))

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P02
Reply.text: I’m working on it.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P03
Reply.text: I’ve changed my mind. I’ll just go and take the storehouse by force.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N01
Reply.text: I can’t believe my eyes. The foreigner has kept his word and our leader is back with us!

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N03
Reply.text: Sure, comrade. Take as much as you can carry and come back anytime.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P02
Reply.text: Now to your part of the deal. Leave the storehouse.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P04
Reply.text: I’ll be back.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N01
Reply.text: What’s up?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02b
Reply.text: I’m almost there.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02a
Reply.text: The storehouse is clear, the work is done.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N03a
Reply.text: Good! Here’s your reward.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N04a
Reply.text: Cool.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N01
Reply.text: I’m in trouble, young man…

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N02
Reply.text: What happened to you?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N03
Reply.text: My husband has gone to the market and never returned. I bet he sold the goods and went on a drinking round. I’m looking for him everywhere.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04b
Reply.text: It’s not my problem.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04a
Reply.text: I can help you find him.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N05a
Reply.text: Thank you, young man. I’ll be waiting for the news in Perch.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N06a
Reply.text: What’s your husband’s name?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N07a
Reply.text: His name’s Philemon and he’s probably drinking now in some local bar.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N09a
Reply.text: I got it. I’ll go check the bars.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N01
Reply.text: What’s up, man?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N02
Reply.text: Philemon, your wife is all worried about you, and you are sitting here drinking!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N03
Reply.text: I’m sick of her. Can’t a man have a night out with his friends?!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N04
Reply.text: Let me walk you home.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N05
Reply.text: I don’t want to go home. And you are starting to get on my nerves, man!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N06
Reply.text: Don’t make me use force on you.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N07
Reply.text: Will you leave me alone, if I pay you?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08b
Reply.text: No, I promised your wife to bring you home.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09b
Reply.text: All right, I’ll go.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08a
Reply.text: I’ll have pity on you. How much?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09a
Reply.text: Will 500 coins be enough?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N10a
Reply.text: I didn’t expect more from you. I’ll take it.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N01
Reply.text: Have you brought my husband back?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02d
Reply.text: No. Why don’t you go and look for him?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02c
Reply.text: I’m still looking.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02b
Reply.text: I found him. He’s in the village.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02a
Reply.text: Here he is. Safe and sound.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N03a
Reply.text: I don’t know how to thank you. I’ve got some things for sale here; I’ll give them to you.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N04a
Reply.text: Thanks. See you.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hi! We are a young married couple – Connie and Blyde… Could you give us a lift? Our car broke down and we really need to get home. We’re ready to pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001081
Reply.text: Nah, I smell rat here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001080
Reply.text: Sure, get in.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thanks for the lift. Meet our friends! And give us what you’ve got in the trunk. It’s a hold up!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001084
Reply.text: I’m not giving you anything.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001083
Reply.text: Damn! So, you are just a bunch of bandits. Take what you want, but don’t kill me.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001085
Reply.text: Ha-ha! Let’s get out of here, guys!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001086
Reply.text: So much for trusting people again...

Reply.name: CrazyMan_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Wanna spice up you life, earn some money or simply have a nice time? The Amusement Center is for you. Want to know more?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001091
Reply.text: I’ve got no time to waste.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001088
Reply.text: Go on.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001241
Reply.text: The Amusement Center is a place, where long distance drivers go to get quality entertainment for their money. Let me show it on your map. It’s right here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001244
Reply.text: I hope the center is as good as they say.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Good day, young man. Are you interested in history of architecture? Not that it matters, really. My end is near and no one wants to take the old man to the ancient crypt. It is a monument of great cultural and architectural value, and I would really like to spend my last hours there. Perhaps you will take me there? I’ll pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001097
Reply.text: I’m afraid I can’t help you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001098
Reply.text: All right, I’ll help you.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg1
Reply.text: We are finally there. Thank you. I’ll find rest in one of those ancient chambers.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001243
Reply.text: Good bye!

Reply.name: Labirint_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Will you help us catch somebody who’s hiding in the town of the dead? He’s a wily old fox and somehow he always get away.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001103
Reply.text: Nah, it’s not for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001100
Reply.text: At last something interesting for a change! Why do you want him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001104
Reply.text: There used to be an Amusement Center down the road, but a bunch of bandits who lost their money there destroyed it in a fit of rage. It was the only entertainment center in the neighborhood! We caught all the bandits, but one. He is hiding in the damn town of the dead! Help us and we’ll pay you generously.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001105
Reply.text: I’d be happy to do it for you.

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg0
Reply.text: You’ve probably come here to win some money and have fun in our Entertainment Center… I’m sorry to tell you that, but we have nothing to offer you. Some bandits lost a lot of money here and razed the center to the ground in a fit of rage. But you don’t want to leave this place empty-handed, do you? Let me propose you a riddle. Pay 100 coins and you’ll get a chance to double it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001108
Reply.text: What a shame. I’m no good at riddles.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001107
Reply.text: That’s better than nothing. Go ahead. Here’s the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001234
Reply.text: Listen carefully. A White driver on a Black truck met a Black driver on a White truck on a narrow road. Who’s gonna die first?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001236
Reply.text: The White one.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001239
Reply.text: Wrong answer! The Black driver on a White truck is an ordinary long-distance driver, who looks well after his truck, but has no time to wash himself. A White driver on a Black truck is a bandit, who looks well after himself, but keeps his truck in a bad state. The ordinary driver will die first, because this is life, not a fairy tale, and in life bad guys always win.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001240
Reply.text: Too bad for my wallet. But that’s wrong kind of riddle...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001235
Reply.text: The Black one.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001237
Reply.text: Right you are! The Black driver on a White truck is an ordinary long-distance driver, who looks well after his truck, but has no time to wash himself. A White driver on a Black truck is a bandit, who looks well after himself, but keeps his truck in a bad state. The ordinary driver will die first, because this is life, not a fairy tale, and in life bad guys always win.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001238
Reply.text: Stupid riddle. Give me my money.

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg1
Reply.text: The Amusement Center isn’t working. Turn round.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001242
Reply.text: What a shame…

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Where are you going? Don’t you see the road is closed?
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Bandits broke into the military base and got some really powerful guns there. Their threats turned out to be real! If we don’t do anything, they’ll occupy our town.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Only two roads lead there: one of them is through our town, the other – through the bandits’ den.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: It’s wartime, man! The town is closed until we sort it out with the bandits. We have to defend ourselves.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: What’s going on here? Why are you running about like crazy?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Good luck to you. By the way, how can I get to the north-east?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Won’t you let me pass?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: What am I to do?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Don’t you see? The road is closed!
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Are you done yet?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg3
Reply.text: State your business.

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Look who’s come! It’s the funny guy again! Want to tickle your nerves again? We won’t let you go so easily!

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You’ve got to pay 500 coins if you want to use the bridge.

Reply.name: BanditPeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Glad to see you! Your money helped us a lot, you know. We bribed the guards in the town and moved to another place. All for your money! Ha-ha-ha. But it doesn’t mean you can drive here you please. The fee will be only 500 coins and that’s with a huge discount, believe us.

Reply.name: NonBomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Welcome to Asgard!

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What brings you here?

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thanks for the help. I doubt they’ll come back soon after that. What do you need? Some explosives? Take as much as you need. There’s nothing we wouldn’t give you.

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Be quick, I’m busy.

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Thank you so much! Now we can finally take a rest without worrying about our lives.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Looks like you’ve come from distant lands. Are you looking for business or adventures here?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: What do you want, tramp?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg15
Reply.text: So, how about my motivation? I could use some cash.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You, again. Now what?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Found out anything?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg4
Reply.text: What do you want, stranger?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000639
Reply.text: I’m looking for someone who lives in the far north. Could you show me the way there?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000640
Reply.text: There’s yet another problem: we have no petrol in town. And you won’t find your way to Ohlm without our guides. If you find petrol for our caravans, you can join them in their journey to the North; they’ll show you the road to Ohlm. Go talk to the mayor now. Tell him Sharky sent you to help with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000641
Reply.text: All right.

Reply.name: MininWorker2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Thanks! You really helped our town. Be our guest anytime you pass by and you can always rely on a discount in our shops.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001095
Reply.text: Now that we’ve solved the petrol problem, you can follow our caravans. They’ll show you the way.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001096
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('d_MoveCanistraToMinin_Quest'); if IsQuestComplete('d_TalkAboutVrataInMinin_Quest') then TakeQuest('FindGomerA_Quest1'); TakeQuest('d_FindVrata_Quest') end; if IsQuestComplete('r1m3_FindHmirinSever') then TakeQuest('r1m4_TalkWithOldTraderAboutSecondDisk') end; RemoveQuestItem('quest_first_canistra'); AddBook('r1_book_travel_kupchina2'); TActivate ('CARAVANTOR1M4'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: WorkerForMoney_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What’s up?

Reply.name: OilMineWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Here’s the first barrel of oil.

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What can I do for you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz447
Reply.text: I heard there is a tunnel nearby that goes through the mountains and leads to the west. Is that right?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz451
Reply.text: Won’t you tell me where exactly it starts?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz452
Reply.text: Let me mark it on your map.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz453
Reply.text: Just like that? And you don’t need my help or my money?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz454
Reply.text: Don’t teach me how to manage my business, young man.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz455
Reply.text: Well I never!

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You again.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz449
Reply.text: Now I see what business you were talking about. Do you happen to have a key from the tunnel door?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz456
Reply.text: Perhaps I do, if I look really hard for it. It will certainly cost me time, efforts and lost profits… 10,000 should be enough to compensate it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz465
Reply.text: I can’t afford it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz457
Reply.text: That’s a lot of money... Oh well, I guess I’ll have to pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz458
Reply.text: You are always welcome.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz459
Reply.text: I can go west now.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('d_FindKeyInTunel_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindZasadaInTunel_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_OpenTunel_Quest'); TDeactivate ('ZASADATUNEL'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); AddQuestItem('quest_key_for_tunnel'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg2
Reply.text: In case you forgot, the key costs 10,000.

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg3
Reply.text: I’m barman. Can I help you?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000632
Reply.text: Yes, you probably can. I’ve been following this girl, she should have stopped by this town or at least she should have passed it on her way.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000633
Reply.text: Let me think…Ummm...Oh, yes! She’s been here! I think she’d left through the tunnel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000634
Reply.text: The tunnel? What tunnel? Can you show it to me?

Reply.name: UnknownFromTunel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Why don’t you get something to drink while we are talking?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz467
Reply.text: Barman, one margarita for me, please! And something for my friend over there. Make sure his glass is always full.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz468
Reply.text: What the…! I’ll…! You’re…! Hrrrrr

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz469
Reply.text: Look at you! You are drunk, my friend. Here is the key. It wasn’t that hard, after all. I’d better be going to the tunnel.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d174
Reply.text: Bandits will never be able to take this road again. Me neither. I’d better find another way. I’ll go ask about it in the town.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d176
Reply.text: I heard here lived Explorer Ivan. I’d like to visit his house.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d177
Reply.text: You’ve come to the right place: Ivan used to live in that house with his wife and son. All was well until that dreadful night when he was out of town and the bandits killed his wife. None of the bandits got out alive, either. That brave woman died protecting her son. Ivan took the boy and left the town. The house has been empty ever since.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d192
Reply.text: I’ve never seen anything that matches your glaring description.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d194
Reply.text: Wait! But I heard it from one of my friends who heard it from one of his friends...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d196
Reply.text: Well, there's a fisherman, who tells the tale of sea treasure and a monster that guards it. No one can find the treasure, though, because only the fisherman knows the place.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d198
Reply.text: What storyteller are you talking about?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d200
Reply.text: Can’t seem to remember his name...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d202
Reply.text: Come to think of it, my memory needs some motivation to get going...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d208
Reply.text: It’s coming back to me now... It was old Homer definitely.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d210
Reply.text: On the seashore, of course – in the fishermen’s village. But here comes another problem. You see, there’s no petrol in town, so our caravans cannot go North. And you won’t find the way to Ohlm alone.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d212
Reply.text: I don't understand what you are talking about. Listen, you seem to be a brave guy. If you help us, you can join our caravan and go North with them. They’ll show you the road to Ohlm. Go talk to the mayor first. Tell him Sharky sent you to help with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d217
Reply.text: You? Well, we actually need all the help we can get.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d219
Reply.text: It’s like in the old joke: there were 20 reasons the guns didn’t shoot. The first one – there were no ammo. Heh… Bandits captured the oil derrick and cut us off the oil. Our petrol supplies are coming to an end.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d222
Reply.text: We didn’t fight as well as we could, because we were busy solving internal problems. You see, our trade union has gone on a strike.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d224
Reply.text: In a word, yes.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d226
Reply.text: We will be very grateful!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d228
Reply.text: But oil isn’t going to flow just like that! The bastards are drinking in the bar, when they could actually do something!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d233
Reply.text: We are on a strike! Can't you see?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d235
Reply.text: Work is hard, pay is small. Why should we work our asses out? When the damn mayor gets all the profit!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d237
Reply.text: It’s the mayor who ravaged the town! Why do we need mayor in the first place? Especially somebody like him. We are on a strike. End of discussion!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d239
Reply.text: Don’t even ask!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d243
Reply.text: I already told you! He’s not going to be an authority anymore. I’ll kick his ass when I see him.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d245
Reply.text: Sure thing!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d252
Reply.text: Tons of money you say. But the work conditions are hell there!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d254
Reply.text: Who told you we don’t want to? Of course we want to. If we could only get some start-up money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d261
Reply.text: Everybody needs Alice. But no one is going to get her! Ha-ha-ha!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d263
Reply.text: Do you really believe we’ll let you leave this place?! We are bandits, in case you didn’t notice… Let’s teach him some manners, guys!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d267
Reply.text: Is she a friend of yours?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d269
Reply.text: I know that girl. I wouldn’t get involved with her if I were you.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d271
Reply.text: There are dangerous people behind her.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d273
Reply.text: She often comes here on some business of her own. The last time I saw her she was heading east. I wouldn’t recommend you going in that direction.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d275
Reply.text: There’s a bandits’ base there. It’s large and well fortified. Bandits won’t negotiate other than in the language of guns. Are you strong enough for that? I’m not so sure.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2149
Reply.text: Blow up that bridge!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2151
Reply.text: The one, on the road leading to the military base. If you destroy it, the enemy won’t get to our town.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2153
Reply.text: First of all, we need to find some explosives. They should have some in Asgard. They are miners, after all. We’ll have to place the charge under the bridge. It’s well guarded of course. But I’m sure, you’ll be ok.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2157
Reply.text: You’ve come to the right place for the explosives. We sell the best bombs in the area.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2159
Reply.text: But we are having problems at the moment, so we won’t be able to produce any explosives in the near future. It’s been in great demand lately.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2161
Reply.text: Just because I like you, I’ll tell you that you can buy some explosives in the miners’ village. The quality of their product is lower, of course.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2165
Reply.text: You are not the only one who needs it. Bandits are constantly attacking us to get our supplies!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2167
Reply.text: To the walls! Everyone! The enemy’s coming! Hey, if you need the explosives, help us defend it!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2200
Reply.text: Why don’t we just take your money and bury your corpse?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2202
Reply.text: What I really like about you is your sense of humor! Pay and go now. But if I see you again, I’ll kill you, man!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den192
Reply.text: Ha-ha-ha! You must be kidding! You come right into our headquarters and start ordering about! It’s been a while since I had such a good laugh with all the raids and murders… Oh, well, Mr. Funny Guy, pay 10,000 and go.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den195
Reply.text: If you manage to get the cash, bring it to us. Now get out of my eyes.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d178
Reply.text: That was a sad story... I’d better go now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d180
Reply.text: Take the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d181
Reply.text: The price is way too high for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d184
Reply.text: Damn! That’s not good.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d191
Reply.text: I’m looking for the Sea Gates, It should be something big. They say I’ll know when I see it. It must be somewhere around here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d193
Reply.text: I guess I’ll have to ask somebody else.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d195
Reply.text: Come on, fess up!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d197
Reply.text: So, what was the name of this storyteller?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d199
Reply.text: The damn fisher! Don't play fool!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d201
Reply.text: Try to remember. Try really hard!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d203
Reply.text: Here are 100 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d204
Reply.text: I’ve got nothing to motivate your memory with at the moment.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d206
Reply.text: Here are 100 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d207
Reply.text: I’ll get you the money soon.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d209
Reply.text: Old Homer? Where can I find him?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d211
Reply.text: Are you trying to wring more money out of me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d213
Reply.text: I’ll go there now.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d215
Reply.text: Sharky sent me to help you with the problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d218
Reply.text: What’s the wrong?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d220
Reply.text: Are you expecting me to go and fight the bandits all on my own, when all men of the town couldn’t handle them?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d223
Reply.text: So, besides getting rid of the bandits, you want me to go and make your workers get back to work or find you some new ones?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d225
Reply.text: All right, I’ll start with the easier one: the bandits.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d227
Reply.text: Bring it on!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d229
Reply.text: Not a big deal.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d230
Reply.text: I’ll see what I can do with your workers. I’ll try to talk some sense into them.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d232
Reply.text: Let’s get back to work, men. Stop sitting here!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d234
Reply.text: What’s the matter?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d236
Reply.text: He says the town is poor, the bandits have ravaged it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d238
Reply.text: But I really need to...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d240
Reply.text: I’ll have to find out what’s the fuss about mayor.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d242
Reply.text: You are right – the mayor is a thief and a liar. I found where he keeps town’s money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d244
Reply.text: Now that you are your own bosses, are you going to work?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d246
Reply.text: Get in the truck then. I'll bring you to the oil mine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d247
Reply.text: Now I'll bring this barrel to the Minin people as a sign that the oil mine is working again.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d249
Reply.text: What about the road to the North?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d251
Reply.text: There’s no one at the oil mine. You can work there and earn tons of money!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d253
Reply.text: Suit yourself. I’ll find other people to do your job.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d255
Reply.text: How much?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d257
Reply.text: Deal. Get in the truck.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d258
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d260
Reply.text: I need to talk to Alice!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d262
Reply.text: I know she's there. I’m not leaving without her.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d264
Reply.text: I don’t care if you are Devil incarnate! I’ll get what I came here for.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d266
Reply.text: I’m looking for a girl named Alice. She’s average height, good looking and is driving a truck of unusual design and color.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d268
Reply.text: No. But she has some information I really need.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d270
Reply.text: Why so?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d272
Reply.text: Cut the crap. Tell me what you know.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d274
Reply.text: Man, are you paranoid or what? Why do you see danger everywhere?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d276
Reply.text: I guess I’ll have to go, if there is no other way. See you!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2148
Reply.text: I see. What do I need to do to be allowed to pass?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2150
Reply.text: What bridge?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2152
Reply.text: How am I supposed to do it?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2154
Reply.text: It is great plan, but why cannot you do it yourselves? Cowards...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2156
Reply.text: I need explosives. Now. It’s a question of life and death.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2158
Reply.text: I’m telling you, it’s urgent!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2160
Reply.text: But I really need it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2164
Reply.text: I was told you’ve got some explosives here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2166
Reply.text: Small wonders, considering Asgard won't sell anything.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2168
Reply.text: There you go again. Not a day without battle! All right, I'll help you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2170
Reply.text: That’s great!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2201
Reply.text: Hmmm... Honor?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2203
Reply.text: Phew! That was close...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1198
Reply.text: Hold it. I’m ready to pay.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1199
Reply.text: Easy. I’ve almost got the right sum.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den191
Reply.text: Hey, guys. Why don’t you let me pass?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den193
Reply.text: I don’t have so much money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den194
Reply.text: Here’s the money.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('BASEATTACK'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den196
Reply.text: I’ll think about it.

Reply.name: BaseBandit_hellodlg0
Reply.text: And what do you think you're doing here?

Reply.name: AboutThief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What's wrong?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000624
Reply.text: Somebody’s broken into father’s house!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000623
Reply.text: I knew something happened. I saw a suspicious-looking man prying about here. I bet it was him. He headed to the bandits’ base.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000625
Reply.text: Thanks for the hint.

Reply.name: Thief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who are you? I don’t know you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000627
Reply.text: You’ve stolen our family jewels! What an insult to my forefathers! I demand you to return the precious thing that does not belong to you.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000628
Reply.text: What? You talk rubbish!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000629
Reply.text: It’s outrageous! I have no other choice but to kill you!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000630
Reply.text: Catch me if you can!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000631
Reply.text: You are a dead man!

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0
Reply.text: We are honest archeologists, but some rogues hinder us from our dig. We would be grateful, if you get rid of them.
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I will see what I can do.

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Get through with it by yourselves.

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Listen, pal, you look like a tough guy. Some strangers are digging for treasures nearby. They are almost defenseless. We can earn a lot of money together.
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I’m in.

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: I won’t attack innocent people.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What’s on your mind?

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Really? It is good news. People are bored.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Do you know that the ancient Colosseum is a battle arena now?

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: See you there. Have fun.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I hope you bring good news.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Great! I will make sure everybody get to know it.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: We are opening a battle arena at the Colosseum.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: See ya.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What brought you here?

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Good news indeed. I will go there and bring friends with me.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: We are opening a battle arena at the Colosseum.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: See you there.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0
Reply.text: People of the Kolkhoz are scared and refuse to harvest. If they leave the fields, we’ll be short of supplies next year. Go and find out what happened there.
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestTaken('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('Signs_Quest'))

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I’ll do it.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: I’m not interested.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Well, what do you want to know?

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I see. Lights, signs on the fields, I heard about it. You came to the right place. We will send an expedition there and calm the people down. Your mission is over. Here is your reward. If you ever see such marks again, do not hesitate to inform us.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: People saw lights in the sky, and then some strange marks appeared on the fields. People are scared. May be you can help.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Of course I will find more of them.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Calm down, young man. I'm listening.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000553
Reply.text: Some large signs periodically appear near Toskana!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000554
Reply.text: Fine, we'll send an expedition immediately.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Young man, you seem to be worrying about something. What happened?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001273
Reply.text: Listen. I was at the Oracle’s island and saw some really strange signs on the fields.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001274
Reply.text: I see! I am currently investigating this phenomenon. Ignott, you say. That’s quite far from here. But it makes sense, after all. I almost forgot, here’s your reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001275
Reply.text: Thanks. If I ever see something of a kind I’ll definitely inform you.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Young man, you contributed a lot to my work. Now I know perfectly well where the next visit will take place. I am so excited!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001277
Reply.text: Do you want me to accompany you?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001278
Reply.text: What? Oh no! I can handle everything by myself. However the outcome may vary greatly. So I want you to keep this document for me. It is of a great historical value!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001279
Reply.text: So what? I guess you have archives somewhere around. Put your paper there.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001280
Reply.text: To tell you the truth, my recent research ruined my reputation. My former colleagues stopped to take me seriously. But you are different! You saw the traces, you will understand! Do not object! You may take this money as well. I won’t need it anymore.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001281
Reply.text: All right. Give it to me. And... Good luck.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Something terrible is happening around here.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Demons spoilt our fields. We cannot harvest anymore.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: One night we saw devilish fires over the fields. Next morning, we found there the mark of evil.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: What scares you?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: What exactly happened?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: I will go there and examine these marks.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: It is too strange to me. I gotta get out of here!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I am opening a battle arena at the ancient Colosseum. Best warriors from all over the world will fight there! The trouble is that nobody knows about us. A little publicity would help us much. Could you visit local towns and tell people about it?

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Well, it may be interesting.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Not right now.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You were of a great help! Here’s your reward. Now we need somebody to show the real fight. Will you agree to help us one more time? Just enter the arena and win!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000588
Reply.text: No! Too much trouble!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: I will bring your business to the prosperity.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2
Reply.text: That was a hell of a fight! Here’s your reward, as usual. You made a lot for the Colosseum. I made up my mind to share my business with you. For a mere 10’000 you will become my companion. It is a rare occasion! You’ll be receiving half of its profit.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: It is a large sum. I have to think it over.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3
Reply.text: So, do you agree to pay 10'000?
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('BuyKollizey_Quest') and not(IsQuestComplete('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_GiveDisk2ToOrakul'))

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_1
Reply.text: Yes, here’s the money.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_2
Reply.text: No, I am not that rich yet

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Howdy man! I owe you some. Last time we met you saved my business. Here, that’s your part of the profit.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001271
Reply.text: It was nice having business with you.

Reply.name: Fermer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I haven't seen you around. What do you need from us?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz276
Reply.text: I look for Ben Throttle.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz277
Reply.text: Who the heck is that?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz278
Reply.text: It was a simple question. Why being rude?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz279
Reply.text: Sorry, I had a hard day. What does this Ben of yours do?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz280
Reply.text: He is an Explorer.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz281
Reply.text: I see. You are one of the weirdos.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz283
Reply.text: Don't play fool. Everybody knows that the Explorers consort with the devil! That's why they live far from other people.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz284
Reply.text: You know where to find one, don't you?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz285
Reply.text: No, I do not. However, I heard a witch lives in the neighborhood. She may show the way, if you do not treasure your soul!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz286
Reply.text: Thanks! You'd better care about yours.

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Thank you, man! The raiders gone mad, we couldn't deliver this cargo for weeks.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz306
Reply.text: That was easy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz312
Reply.text: We got unloaded. So we are about to set off. Tell us, when you are ready.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz314
Reply.text: Wail a minute, I got to take a rest and refuel my car.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz313
Reply.text: Let's go right now.

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready now?

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Get out of here, ignorant farmer! It is not a place for your kin.

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You made us a favor, now you can ask for a reward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz318
Reply.text: I was told Ben Throttle lives nearby. Can I talk to him?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz317
Reply.text: You are right. His house is to the south from here. Let me mark it on your map.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz319
Reply.text: Finally, I will learn who I really am.

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What do you need?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz460
Reply.text: I am looking for a girl. Her name is Alice.Do you happen to know where she is now?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001287
Reply.text: Alice was here, but she left for Porto several hours ago.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001288
Reply.text: Thanks, I will keep searching.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz290
Reply.text: What's wrong?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz297
Reply.text: How dare you ask? Look at yourself. Our town is the last resort of civilization in this God forsaken world. And I will allow no farmer to break any of the priceless exhibits we have there, in the museum! Go away, low life.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz298
Reply.text: I was expecting the museum to be open for public. How can you call yourself civilized with such an attitude toward strangers?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz299
Reply.text: Hem, sorry, stranger... You are right. I was a bit harsh. Let me apologize and offer you a deal. You seem to be the very man we need for a dangerous mission. Help us, and we will cooperate.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz300
Reply.text: You are all crazy. Why can't you just answer my question? All right, tell me of that 'mission' of yours.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz301
Reply.text: The roads became dangerous lately. Make sure our caravan gets to Porto and back in safety. If you agree, go speak to our steward.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz302
Reply.text: I'll do it.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Ivan, that's you!? I cannot believe... No, you are not him. Sorry, young man, I mistook you for someone I used to know... What do you need from me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz322
Reply.text: My stepfather was killed, but he managed to spell your name. Here are my real father things. He was an Explorer, like you.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz324
Reply.text: I knew you would finally come!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz325
Reply.text: What do you mean?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz326
Reply.text: You look like your father. Small wonder I mistook you for him.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz327
Reply.text: Slow down. Explain yourself.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz328
Reply.text: You came to the right place, if you want to know, who you are. Your father's name is Ivan Go. A great Explorer he was! He rediscovered countless towns and inventions.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz329
Reply.text: You cannot be serious.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz330
Reply.text: But I am. Believe me, the world around you is the merit of Ivan. Years ago, we dwelled in darkness with no radio or electricity. There was no way for us to contact with other people settlements. We were scared and lonely. But he led us to the light.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz331
Reply.text: Actually, I never knew how great my father was. I didn’t even know I had one. Except for poor Peter...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz332
Reply.text: It’s high time to learn.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz333
Reply.text: Right. What happened to him? Is he dead now?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz334
Reply.text: Nobody knows. He just disappeared one day. He was a real hero then, so no one would dare to harm him. Besides, there were few who really could. Ivan made a real wonder of his truck, and a dangerous one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz335
Reply.text: You mean he may still be alive?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz336
Reply.text: I always hoped someone would come and ask that question. Yes I think he may be alive.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz337
Reply.text: I have to find him then! Show me the way. What do you know about his disappearance?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz338
Reply.text: I had no clues but my gut feeling until now. But I think I recognize that disk of yours.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz339
Reply.text: It is just a piece of plastic. How can it help us?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz340
Reply.text: It is much more than that! The disk is a book, and with any luck, it is Ivan’s diary! Unfortunately, there is almost no way one can read it... Except may be... Yes! Go to your father’s house in Minin. There you must find the machine that reads. I will stay here and make some researches of mine.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz341
Reply.text: Thanks for the guidance. I’ll find everything out.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Greetings, young man.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000621
Reply.text: Are you Ben Throttle? I’m looking for a thing you might know something about. It’s a plastic disc and it may have symbols I G and 2 on one of its sides.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000620
Reply.text: Let me think. Somebody did offer me to buy a disc like the one you described. I told him people in Midgard might be interested in that sort of thing.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000622
Reply.text: I was hoping you have it... Thanks for a hint, anyway.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You haven’t forgotten the old man! I’m so glad to see you again!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000653
Reply.text: I wonder if Ivan Go saw flying ships in his travels. Did he tell you anything about them, by any chance?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000654
Reply.text: He did, in fact. We used to sit on the grass and swap stories. He would tell me about the lights in the sky, the shining discs and that sort of rubbish. He mentioned Seil, and I told him...

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000655
Reply.text: Seil it was! I’d love to hear the end of your story, but I really need to be going now.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001282
Reply.text: But it is really important! Now that you mentioned it, I remembered one legend,

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001283
Reply.text: I saw a lot during my travels. You cannot surprise me. I have a matter of utmost importance to attend to.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001284
Reply.text: Wait. That’s exactly why I want you to read it. I have a feeling that you may understand it better than anyone else. Better than me... please, read it.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001285
Reply.text: Oh well... Give it to me.

Reply.name: PortoCitizen0
Reply.text: What? Are you talking to me?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz462
Reply.text: Don't you know where I can find a girl named Alice?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001289
Reply.text: No, Lisa never came here. Probably she was attacked by raiders on her way here. Their hide-out is at the seashore

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001290
Reply.text: I'll go check this out.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg0
Reply.text: So, the sent you to protect the caravan... You don’t look tough, but who cares.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz292
Reply.text: Wait, till you see me in business.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz307
Reply.text: Ok. I'll mark the destination point on your map. You have to be careful on your road there. There are a couple of good places for an ambush. Am I clear?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz308
Reply.text: More than ever. When are we setting out?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz309
Reply.text: Right now, if you are ready. But we can wait for you to make some last adjustments.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz311
Reply.text: I have a couple of things to do. Wait for me.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz310
Reply.text: I am ready to go.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Are you ready now?

Reply.name: Staruha_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Who's there? I do not expect anyone.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz288
Reply.text: Are you the witch?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz293
Reply.text: How rude of you, young man. Do you always believe in what people say?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz294
Reply.text: Sorry, I meant no offence... I look for Ben Throttle, he ...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz295
Reply.text: No offence taken. As much as I know, Ben lives somewhere around Midgard. Ask there. And learn to be more polite.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz296
Reply.text: Thank you. You were of a great help.

Reply.name: Umelec_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Good day.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000590
Reply.text: I need to upgrade my truck according to this scheme.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000596
Reply.text: Let me take a look... aha... No, it’s not going to work out.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000597
Reply.text: But why? The scheme is non clear?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000598
Reply.text: No it is ok. But, the instruments I’m going to need for that kind of work are very expensive.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000599
Reply.text: Money is not a problem.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000600
Reply.text: Besides, we’ll need a rare material – composite alloy, which is not produced anymore. Hopefully, it is possible to obtain if from ancient artifacts.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000601
Reply.text: Where can I find it?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000602
Reply.text: You should look in the ancient machinery.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000603
Reply.text: I wonder where I can get such a thing. Any idea, what kind of machinery do I need?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000604
Reply.text: You’ll recognize it by a bluish tint. In fact, warriors in the Colosseum often put old artifacts in. It might just be what you need. And remember to bring me 15,000 cash for the work.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000605
Reply.text: Sure. At least I know where to look now.

Reply.name: Umelec_hellodlg1
Reply.text: If you still want to upgrade your truck, bring me the composite alloy and 15,000 cash.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000613
Reply.text: Yes, I remember that.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000612
Reply.text: I brought you the money and the alloy.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000614
Reply.text: Look at that! It’s going to be enough to upgrade a whole bunch of cars! I’m ready to work for only 10,000 if you let me keep the rest of the material.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000615
Reply.text: There you are.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000616
Reply.text: It’s going to take a couple of hours. Wait here.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000617
Reply.text: All right.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000618
Reply.text: Check it out!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000619
Reply.text: Now I can finally see what lies beyond the desert.

Reply.name: Fighter1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What’s up, brave guy? Ready to fight and win?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000606
Reply.text: I might, if the reward is good enough. Have you got any artifacts made of composite alloy?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000610
Reply.text: Let me think… I’ve got one in my truck. You can have it if you win. But it’s going to be a death-match. The winner takes it all. Deal?

Reply.name: Fighter2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: What is it? Ready to fight me on the Arena?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000607
Reply.text: I am, as long as the reward is worth fighting for. Have you got composite alloy?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000608
Reply.text: You aren’t a true warrior, if it’s only the reward you are interested in. Go ask the lady warrior. She’s won a lot of battles; she may have the thing you need.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg2
Reply.text: What do you want? I'm busy!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000636
Reply.text: Has anybody offered you to buy a strange-looking object in a form of a disc lately?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000637
Reply.text: In fact, somebody did offer to buy the kind of object you described. But we weren’t interested, so he went on, to the north.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000638
Reply.text: To the north, you say… Thanks for the information.

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Do you have a truck?

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Great! We are about to punish raiders, who infests our land, and we need every hotshot to help us. Are you with us?

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Yes, a heavily armored one!

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Let’s rock!

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: No, do it yourself.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Young man, could you please do me a small favor.
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken( 'WorkGiver_Quest1' )) and (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'TalkWithFather_Quest' )) and QuestStatus('Buyer_Quest1')==Q_COMPLETED

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I have an important business offer to Sergo, but I didn’t expect to see him today so I left all necessary papers at home.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Please bring me to the filling station as fast as possible, so that I could collect all documents and make an offer to Sergo. You will not have to wait for me; I can find a car at my neighbors.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: It depends… I’m listening.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: What exactly do you need from me?

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Get in, lead the way.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: No, that’s just too far. My father is waiting for me at home.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1
Reply.text: You have spoiled the most important deal in my life! Go away!

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Easy, man...

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You could drive faster. I am in a hurry!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000558
Reply.text: Just pay and get out of my car.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000559
Reply.text: I’ll find a more agile driver to bring me back to Sowth.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000557
Reply.text: Man, you’re such a boor!

Reply.name: Medik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: A fellow traveler I see. For a mere 99 coins, I could show you the location of ancient hospital. It probably contains tons of useful stuff!
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestItemPresent( 'quest_medicine_box' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestFailed( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' ))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000562
Reply.text: I won’t waste my money on that.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000561
Reply.text: Talk, here’s the money!

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg0
Reply.text: I’m an old soldier. People would shudder at the sound of my name. It’s all in the past now... I’m sitting here and tell stories for money. It’s 10 coins for a short one.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000564
Reply.text: Let’s give it a try.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000578
Reply.text: Watch your truck fuel level, pal. If you stop in the middle of nowhere, you’ll die!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000579
Reply.text: Cheater, I knew it already!

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Want some more guidance? Well, it’s 15 coins!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000574
Reply.text: No thanks!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000566
Reply.text: What 15?! Here you are.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000580
Reply.text: Remember! When you’re surrounded by enemy cars – do not stop! Move like a crazy so that they couldn’t hit you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000581
Reply.text: Hem, interesting...

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg2
Reply.text: You again? You are curious indeed. Hand over 20 coins if you want to know more.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000568
Reply.text: Take it...

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000582
Reply.text: If you want to drive fast – keep your truck on the road. Dirt and sand will slow you greatly.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000583
Reply.text: I’ll consider this.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg3
Reply.text: You seem to you like my stories. Next one is 25 coins.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000576
Reply.text: It’s a waste of money.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000570
Reply.text: You are truly interesting person.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000584
Reply.text: Local farmers do not understand a thing in the commerce. You can easily buy cheap goods and sell them at a double price to their neighbors!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000585
Reply.text: Thanks for the advice.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg4
Reply.text: What do you need from me? You are adult enough to do without advices! All right, give me 30 coins. It’s the last time I help you.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000577
Reply.text: I can do well without advices indeed.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000572
Reply.text: Here’s the money.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000586
Reply.text: Listen carefully, boy. You waste you time talking with me in this dirty bar. If you were a little bit cleverer, you’d already earn enough money to buy a better truck and went exploring. Well, to the advice: find a botanist and prove that you are not a loafer after all.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000587
Reply.text: You were of a great help.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Greetings, traveler! I sit here all day cultivating plants. They grew ill lately. They need to be cured and placed in a new greenhouse. Please bring me some medicine and so that I could save my beloved plants! There was an old hospital nearby. As a reward you’ll get old weaponry I found while digging around.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000592
Reply.text: I’ll try to find what you need!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000589
Reply.text: I’ve got some medicine in the trunk.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); CompleteQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_medicine_box'); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'hornet01', 2, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'specter01', 1, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000594
Reply.text: It doesn’t concern me.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Have you found it?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Look who’s there. I hope you’ve got some business proposal.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Yes, I am Sergo. And you must be Peter’s son. You’ve grown up since I last saw you.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Let us take a look at your merchandise.| Well, I'll give you 100 coins. Do you agree?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Good day, Sir. Arent you Sergo by chance? I brought you a package from Glukhoe.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: That’s my first trip. Shall we talk business?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: That’ll do. Exactly what the father told me.
Reply.scriptResult: SetRadarUpgrade(1); TActivate('DestroyGloohoe'); TActivate('RETURN_TO_FATHER'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_potato'); CompleteQuest( 'Buyer_Quest1' ); TakeQuest('TalkWithFather_Quest'); AddBook('r1_book_the_mask'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Good merchandise, as usual.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: I'm glad to hear it.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Go, son. Make me proud of you.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: I'll be right back.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001245
Reply.text: I hope so.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001246
Reply.text: See ya.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Want something to drink, young man?

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Of course I know! Take it, it is in perfect state.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: The barman of Sowth sent me to get something from you. You know what I mean.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000593
Reply.text: There's no room in your trunk, so I'll leave it in a box by your car.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000595
Reply.text: Thanks a lot. Now I will hunt Felix down!

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Thanks a lot. Now I will hunt Felix down!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Aren't you from Glukhoe?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: We already know and we condole with you. We live in a dangerous world, young man.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Never heard of him... Try Aeterna, many traders visit it. You can learn something from them. But what do you need from this man?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Someone attacked it, everybody is dead! My father...

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: I can handle it. Have you heard about Ben Throttle the Explorer?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: He can give me my life back. Farewell, people. I will miss you.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: What’s wrong? You look awful.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_1
Reply.text: That's terrible! Who could have done this? No gang passed through Sowth. We would have noticed.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_2
Reply.text: Calm down! Having enough power to destroy the defenders of the village, they will easily kill you.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_3
Reply.text: I hate the raiders too! But how can you find them? There seem to be no witness of the crime.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_4
Reply.text: Felix is dangerous man... However, you don't care, as I can see. Well, he resides in a small well-defended village. A base, I would say.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_5
Reply.text: Actually, we had a truce of a kind with him... We pay him and he does not harm our villagers.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_6
Reply.text: But now you are going to attack their lair! Well, I also want to get rid of this Felix, so I will help you! You gonna need a better weapon. Go to Troitsk and talk to the barman. He owes me something.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Glukhoe is burnt down! Everybody is dead... my father...

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: They came another way then! I must find them and avenge my father!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_2
Reply.text: Think twice before talking like this! They are murderers! They will pay!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_3
Reply.text: Come to think of it, I know the name of the murderer. It can only be Felix!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_4
Reply.text: Now I know for sure it was him and his gang!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_5
Reply.text: Now the treaty is broken! I have already met him on the battlefield and won!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_6
Reply.text: Thanks a lot!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Well, any good news?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_1
Reply.text: Thank you for relieving us of his gang. Take this money as a sign of our gratitude. You can also leave my weapon. Hope it will serve you better than me.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1
Reply.text: Felix won't trouble you anymore. He ran like a dog!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: Farewell, good man. I will remember your kindness.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Howdy, man! May I ask you a favor?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: I have a business here and I need someone to show me the way around these lands.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: It is none of your concern. I pay well enough to keep your mouth shut.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: Says who? Are you in?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_4
Reply.text: As you wish, boy. I think we shall meet again.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Are you talking to me? Ah, yes of course!

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: What kind of business is it?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: I smell fish. You have a look of a criminal on you.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Why not? I will help you.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAACTIVE'); TakeQuest('d_Lisa_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r1_Yes_Lisa_History_01' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: I do not want to have anything in common with raiders. Leave me be.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_5
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAREMOVE'); TActivate('ZASADA_4'); AddHistory( 'r1_No_Lisa_History_02' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()
